J’ai apprécié qui m’explique la différence entre les interventions et ce qui me convenait le mieux. L’équipe qui entourait ce médecin était vraiment extraordinaire en plus d'être accueillante. Et les biscuits ajoutent un petit quelque chose. ? Le plus impressionnant est le résultat! Compte tenu de ma prescription précédente j’avais mes doutes mais maintenant je suis RAVIE!! Je vois super bien et pour une grande sportive comme moi, ne plus porter de c’est super. Je recommande cette chirurgie car cela vaut vraiment la peine et la rémission ne prend que quelques jours. Merci à lasik md!

I did lasik surgery 3 weeks ago with Dr. Wallerstein. He is the most trusted doctor I've ever seen. I didn't know That I should do standard or custom. Or even if it is gonna be custom, should I do blade-less or with blade (I forgot the names). one hour before the surgery, between his surgeries, he spend some time to patiently explain every single detail about the advantages and disadvantages of each case. After talking to him, I had no worries about the surgery, since he made me sure that I am gonna be in good hands. He is so knowledgeable, kind, patient and responsible. Since the surgery, 3 weeks ago, my eyes haven't had any complication and I am enjoying my vision every single morning I wake up and see CN Tower clearly.

On June 16,10 i had my Laser eye surgery(PRK)with Dr.Wallerstein at Lasik md .The staff members are very knowledgeable and professional.Before the surgery Dr.Wallerstein took some time with me so that i feel comfortable .He explained about the procedure in depth.He is very polite and down to earth .I am very happy with surgery it changed my whole world .My precreption was almost-6.50 now i can see without glasses and contact lenses clearly.he is the best surgeon.

En février dernier j'ai subi une chirurgie réfractive chez LASIK MD. Mon expérience a été très agréable; j'ai été servi de façon très polie et sympathique par tous les employés. Pour ma chirurgie, j'ai été assigné a Dr Wallerstein, il a été très courtois et j'ai apprécié qu'il ait pris le temps de bien m'expliquer les raisons pour lesquelles on m'avait conseillé la chirurgie personnalisée (mes pupilles sont beaucoup plus grandes que la moyenne, il fallait donc éviter les halos). Il a été très calme et gentil, des qualités très importantes pour une patiente stressée. Je recommanderais très facilement Dr Wallerstein à mes amis. Ma chirurgie s'est déroulée a la clinique de Montréal et mes suivis a Laval ou j'ai eu aussi un excellent service (j'ai apprécié d'avoir le choix des succursales). Bref, il y a maintenant un mois et demie depuis ma chirurgie -le tout s'est bien déroulé et je vais certainement partager mon expérience avec mon entourage.

Dr. Avi Wallerstein is amazing!!! He was my surgeon for my laser eye surgery at LASIK MD and he was calm, informative and thorough. I am now able to see 20/20 with no glasses or contacts and I see clearer now then I did before with my glasses or contacts. I want to thank you so much for being so kind and being able to give me a great experience. Kimberley Galazka

I couldn't have asked for a better doctor to perform my LASIK surgery. Dr. Wallerstein was very nice and helpful throughout the process, answering any and all questions and going out of his way to make me feel comfortable. He explained every step with great detail BEFORE performing it and that was a big plus. I would recommend him to everyone looking to get LASIK as he makes you feel as safe as possible during a procedure like this.

My decision to have laser eye surgery took many years. The thought of someone touching my eyes was not very appealing; I even had a hard time putting contacts in my own eyes. On the day of my surgery, I met with a counsellor who explained what I would have to do after my surgery, including schedule for drops and activities that I could and could not do. As soon as I sat in the operating room, Dr. Wallerstein came to see me, and as soon as he asked how I was doing, all of my fears and nervousness vanished. His voice was very calming and he talked to me during the whole procedure, explaining what he was doing and what would be done next. I sat up on the operating table and slowly opened my eyes. I could actually see the shape of the assistant’s nose and the clock on the opposite wall. For 21 years, it took coke bottle glasses to be able to read a book or see the time on my alarm clock in the morning. I have a newfound freedom I cannot believe I lived without for so long!

I have been wearing glasses for over 15 years and struggling with them. Lasik surgery was the best decision I ever made. On my surgery day I was extremely nervous, Dr. Wallerstein's calming personality helped me remain calm and mellow throughout the duration of the surgery. He took the time to explain in detail prior to the surgery and gave me a realistic idea of what to expect afterwards (healing and results). He reassured me every step of the way which provided me with a lot of confidence. Dr. Wallerstein is an amazing surgeon. He is professional and knowledgeable. I'm still always amazed as to how clear and sharp my vision is compared to my contacts and glasses (what I can remember of them). My experience of Lasik surgery has been painless and rewarding.

Hello I have been wearing glasses for over 20yrs, got used to them so much so that I had to wear them when I woke up in the middle of the night. I also wore contact lenses but was not satisfied because they never really lasted. So the surgery was a big decision. I considered the monetary factor and the possibility of losing my sight. I consulted with my personal Dr, met with Lasik MD employees and exchanged e-mails with their past patients. I was nervous on the day of the surgery but talking to the surgeon, Dr Avi Wallerstein, helped ease my worries. Dr Wallerstein explained the process and the dangers involved. He made sure to talk me through, let me know what he was doing at all times to calm me down. I can now do all sorts of activities without needing glasses or contact lenses, especially swimming. It's truly been a life changing experiencing and it's something I still can't get used to. Didier

Spectacular doctor, with a great bedside manner. In addition to being technically excellent (my surgery was a complete success), Dr. Wallerstein walked me through the entire procedure and always let me know what was about to happen. Although I went in the room nervous, he really helped me through the process. He was very calming.

I had a great experience with Dr.Wallerstein at Lasik MD. Poor eyesight had a negative impact on my life. It made me feel insecure, but wearing glasses affected my self esteem. I had been considering laser eye surgery for some time but the thought of having surgery done on my eyes terrified me. Dr.Wallerstein and the staff ere terrific and supportive. He addressed my fears by walking me through the procedure before hand.During the procedure he explained exactly what was happening and what sensations I was likely to feel. He talked me through the surgery step by step. The montreal clinic being relaxing and aesthetic provided a reassuring waiting experience. Also the waiting room is equipped with big screen T.V's, computers, a jumbo fish tank and cookies to preoccupy you. Laser eye surgery transformed my life, for anyone considering it, I highly recommend Dr.Wallerstein at Lasik MD.
Great experience with Doc Wallerstein!! Perfect vision for the last 5 years following Lasik. Professionally-run operation with great bedside manner. Highly recommended.

J’ai eu la chirurgie au laser Zyoptix avec Dr Wallerstein il y a maintenant 2 ans. Je suis extrêmement satisfait des résultats. Bien qu’on m’avait expliqué que la vision pouvait prendre quelques semaines à se rétablir dans mon cas ce fut très clair dès le lendemain et ma vision est toujours aussi bonne aujourd’hui. J’avais un astigmatisme modéré et je pouvais fonctionner sans mes lunettes mais maintenant je vois toujours très clair ce qui est très agréable pour les sports et activités sociales. J’ai été rassuré de faire la chirurgie avec un médecin qui en a plusieurs milliers à son actif et effectivement je l’ai trouvé très professionnel. Je recommande cette chirurgie et Dr. Wallerstein à tous ceux qui souhaitent voir sans lunettes/lentilles.

J’ai eue la chance d’être opérée par le Docteur Wallerstein lors de mon intervention laser chez Lasik MD. Mon expérience avec ce chirurgien se résume en un mot : EXTRAORDINAIRE. C’est un chirurgien extrêmement compétent et d’une grande humanité. Il m’a d’abord expliqué mon dossier de façon claire et honnête, ce que j’ai grandement apprécié. Pendant l’intervention, il a su me rassurer en expliquant toutes les étapes de la chirurgie. Je savais déjà qu’il était un des chirurgiens les plus expérimentés en Amérique du Nord, et je peux vous confirmer qu’il maintient sa réputation de grand chirurgien. Si vous songez à subir une intervention au laser, Dr. Wallerstein et son équipe vont s’occuper de vous a merveille! Je vois 104%, et je me félicite d’avoir choisi Avi Wallerstein pour s’occuper de mes yeux!
Very knowledgeable and put me at ease for my surgery

Dr. W. is very knowledgeable and easy to ask questions. His staff is great and explained in detail the process. Although it took my vision at least a week to get to teh level that it is now, I am VERY happy with my vision results. I do not see any halos althiough I was warned about this due to my big pupils. I took the Zioptix option as a result and it seems to have bneen a good choice. I did have dry eyes for about 10 days after surgery but now that is gone. Of note, the waiting time for exams can be a bit long, but they have a computer in the waiting room which I used so that can make the wait seem more tolerable.

Dr. Wallerstein answered my questions and seemed to genuinely care about each patient, despite the fact that he has done tens of thousands of these. On my suirgery day, I was impressed by the large waiting room that was full of patients that seemed to be very happy with their experience. The waiting time on teh surgery day was a bit long, but there was someone always coming by in teh waiting room and reasuring me. The surgery was less expensive than the other centers taht I had visited and yet the level of service was second to none. I would recommend LASIK MD and Dr. Wallerstein in particular for anyone interested in LASIK.
He is a great surgeon - explained everything and talked me through the entire process. I would recommend laser eye surgery to everyone - can't believe I waited so long.

Excellent chirurgien. J'ai subit le Lasik Zyoptix aux deux yeux et je suis pleinement satisfaite des résultats. Ma vision est très bonne ainsi que la guérison. Docteur très professionnel et compétent. Je le recommanderais à tout le monde. Quel plaisir que de retrouver une bonne vision sans lunettes ni verres de contact.

I was only in contact with Dr. Wallerstein very briefly (during my time in the operating room). He was very professional and seemed knowledgeable. He was very friendly and did a good job in putting me at ease. I am still recovering so I can't really evaluate my satifaction of the outcome at this point. I am pleased with Dr. Wallerstein overall, however, not so much with how the office is managed. The downtown Toronto office is very busy so maybe it is operated at the most efficient way possible. I wish the visits could be more personalized. Even trying to get through to the office by phone is difficult as you have to go through the customer patient line first, which can be rather frustrating at times. For anyone considering laser eye surgery my advice would be to do as much research as possible (there are tons of information online).

Dr. Wallerstein performed LASIK on my eyes and now I have dry eyes and horrible night visions. My experience... his clinic is business first and health care second. I'm sure the majority of his surgeries go wonderfully... but for the odd ones that don't, like mine, there is little concern shown by his office. In fairness, responsibility during the LASIK procedure lies with both the patient and doctor. I did not do sufficient research prior to the surgery and so I am partially to blame. That does not exculpate Dr. Wallerstein for some of the mistakes I believe he made. I'm sure he's long since forgeotten me.... but every time I look at something in the night I have no choice but to remember him. Do your research before you go for LASIK. Be careful going to Doctors who attract clientele based on low prices!

I wanted to take a moment to express my deepest gratitude for the exceptional care I received during my recent eye surgery. The kindness, expertise and professionalism truly made a difference in my life, and I am forever grateful.

J’ai choisi d’opter pour Lasik MD à Laval pour ma correction de la vue au laser. Je dois dire que je suis très satisfaite de mon choix. I decided to go with Dr. Demers for my LASIK surgery because of all the good things I had heard about him through a friend who had been operated by him (friendly, experienced, professional…). J'ai subit une correction de la vue au laser avec Dr. Demers le 4/10/10 chez LASIK MD. je portais des verres de contact depuis 15 ans déjà et je suis devenue intolérante au verre de contact, alors je devais porter que mes lunettes, pas tres sexy pour une fille de 30 ans célibataire;-) j'étais myope à -2.75 et astigmate à -1.5 pour les 2 yeux. 3500$ et vous avez à débourser 50$ de plus pour les prescription de gouttes post opératoire. chirurgie rapide 2 minutes par oeil, tout a été super. le Dr. Demers calme tres sympatique et professionel, cependant on ne le rencontre que lors de la chirurgie..les examens pré et post opératoire sont effectués pas les ophtalmologiste et optométrice de la clinique, (tres compétents)la journée même de l'opération de suis retourné chez moi en transport en commun tout a bien été, je n'avais pas d'accompagnateur. douleur post opératoire quasi nul. ca vaut la peine .JAI MAINTENANT UNE VISION PARFAITE 20/20 YOUPIII ;-)
Dr. Pierre Demers has very good people skills and will make you comfortable as soon as enter the room. He let me know what I was about to feel at every step of the surgery.

J'ai adoré mon expérience chez Lasik MD. J'ai choisi de me faire opérer par le docteur Demers, car il m'avait été recommander par plusieurs personnes de mon entourage. Je suis extrêmement content de l'avoir choisi pour mon opération et il m'a immédiatement mis en confiance dès que je suis entrée dans le bloc opératoire. Grâce à M.Demers, je peux aujourd'hui bénéficier d'une vision parfaite et jouir de la vie. Je le recommande donc à tout qui désire se faire opérer les yeux aux laser.

J'ai adoré mon expérience chez Lasik MD. Je suis très heureuse de ma nouvelle vision maintenant. L’équipe est formidable et a su me mettre à l’aise tout le long du processus. En ce qui a trait au chirurgien je me compte privilégiée d?être une patiente a Dr. Demers. Il s?est montré très rassurant, professionnel et disponible. Il a su contrôler ma sécheresse oculaire qui est survenue après l’intervention et ainsi me redonner ainsi une très bonne vision. Je le remercie pour son dévouement. C’est un excellent ophtalmologiste.

Dr. Demers a fait ma correction de la vue au laser et je vois encore parfaitement! Je suis plus que satisfaite! Ma sœur s’est fait opérée par lui aussi et elle est tout autant heureuse. Dr. Demers a été très gentil, très humain pendant tout le temps de la chirurgie. Il m’a bien expliqué les étapes tout en les faisant lui-même. Il a aussi détendu l’atmosphère avec quelques blagues! Je le recommande a tous, ainsi que toute l’équipe de Lasik MD a Sherbrooke.

My prescription is not high enough to have the surgery but I found it interesting to learn what a pre-operative exam consisted of at Lasik MD. I did many interesting tests during this consultation and the employees answered all my questions and explained every step in detail. I even got to meet with Dr. Demers and he explained my options to me. He was very friendly, professional, and answered all of my questions. I will definitely be going back there when the time comes for me to have the surgery.

Je dois avouer avoir été un peu nerveuse vis-à-vis la chirurgie. Bien que je connaisse plusieurs personnes l’ayant subit et m’ayant expliqué à maintes reprises que c’était indolore, j’avais tout de même des craintes. Par contre, lorsque docteur Demers s’est assis devant moi et m’a dit que j’étais une excellente candidate puis que la chirurgie allait bien se passer, ce stress a diminué tout de suite en partant. Durant l’intervention, ce qui m’a beaucoup aidé fut lorsqu’il me donnait un aperçu du temps requis à chaque étape, par exemple `` il reste 8 seconde`` lorsqu’il créait mon volet. Le processus fut rapide, indolore et je dirais même plaisant. La chirurgie réfractive est une expérience incroyable qui, surtout, change une vie! Je ne regrette en rien mon choix, au contraire je serai prête à refaire le processus demain! Je recommande fortement docteur Demers, son expérience et sa confiance ont l’effet d’un calmant.

After 16 years of dependency, I must admit that I was extremely excited to kiss my glasses goodbye. Today, two weeks after my PRK surgery, I have absolutely no regrets! First of all, when I came to the clinic for my pre-operative evaluation, I was pleased to see that the staff, from the receptionist to the optometrist, made me feel important and that they care about the health of my eyes. The surgeon who performed my PRK surgery was Dr. Pierre Demers. I am extremely satisfied by him, mainly because he automatically made me feel at ease. During the surgery, he guided me and gave me positive feedbacks on how it was going. Needless to say, this laser eye surgery changed my life. I can now see in a way that I never would have imagined I would be able to.

Voici mes impressions concernant ma chirurgie avec Dr. Demers.Il a été très rassurant, en arrivant il a fait une farce ce qui a détendu l'atmosphère, il nous parle tout au long de la chirurgie ce qui nous aide a pensé a autre chose et cela passe très vite. Premièrement, le service en clinique a Québec est hors-pair; une belle équipe en place, donc très rassurant pour un opéré. Très accueillant, et quel professionnalisme de la part de tous. L'expérience est concluante du début a la fin et le tout s'est bien déroulé avant, pendant et après la chirurgie. On parle toujours de la joie de ne plus porter de lunettes, la je suis a même de le constater moi-même: en plus de ressentir une plus grande liberté même si je dois porter des lunettes de lecture je suis entièrement satisfaite d'avoir une vision au loin plein champ, sans avoir a me soucier des aberations des foyers progressifs si excellents soit ils. Je suis emballée par la chirurgie et je la recommanderai a tous,avec Dr.Demers..

Je me suis fait opérer les yeux au laser en Mai 2009 à la clinique Lasik MD de Sherbrooke. C'est une très belle clinique qui inspire la confiance. Les membres de l'équipe comprenne la peur que les patients recente lors du jour ''J'' et savent comment la faire disparaitre. J'ai été rassuré de voir le professionalisme et l'expertise des employés. De plus, le Dr.Demers est un excellent chirurgien et un homme extrèmement compatissant. Il sait comment rassurer ses patients et les mettre en confiance. Me faire corriger les yeux au laser avec lui était l'une des meilleures decisions de toute ma vie. À tout les jours je remercie la vie d'avoir eu un chirugien comme lui qui me permette de voir sans lunettes ou verres de contacts. Je recommencerais cette expérience à n'importe quel moment. Si vous avez un problème de la vue, je vous recommande de confier vos yeux à Lasik MD et ses professionels le plus tôt possible.

Dr. Demers, qui a effectué ma chirurgie, est un chirurgien hors paire. Il est dynamique et sait ou il va ! Il est rassurant et prend le temps nécessaire pour nous mettre en confiance. Lors de mon ‘’grand jour’’ j’étais vraiment stressée, même si je savais pertinemment que je n’avais pas à l’être ! Dr. Demers a su détendre l’atmosphère et me faire sentir à l’aise. Tout s’est déroulé sans douleur et dans les règles de l’art ! Quel chirurgien extraordinaire que ce Dr. Demers ! J’étais très heureuse que ce soit lui qui m’opère ! Bravo Lasik MD et surtout, bravo Dr. Demers pour ce professionnalisme ! Je suis très heureuse des résultats de ma chirurgie ! Quelle différence comparativement à mes vieux verres de contacts !!! :)

After six months of research and anxiety about laser corrective eye surgery, my concerns were quickly dispelled from the moment I was greeted by the warm handshake and friendly smile of Dr Demers . His welcoming demeanor and quiet confidence spoke volumes to reassure me. I was in highly capable hands. I was verbally guided every step of the way, helping to demystify the experience before my imagination could wander. My normal aversion to any touching around my eyes was alleviated by his expert manner and afforded me the necessary trust to relax my eyes as he prepared me for the actual laser treatment. My surgery was completed in a remarkably brief few minutes. No discomfort. No dramatic blurry vision. I could walk about and function. Without glasses. WOW .

I had my surgery done one year ago with Dr. Demers in Laval. This surgery was the best thing I’ve done. Dr. Demers is an amazing surgeon: He is a very kind person who knows how to make his patients feel comfortable and Lasik MD’s employees were all very professional. The surgery would be something I would do again without hesitating and I do suggest this surgery to everybody. It is a life changing experience.

I saw 6 ophtalmologists over the course of one year and they were unable to figure out what I had and they kept prescribing medication but my problem always kept coming back. Dr. Demers was the 7th ophtalmologist I went to and he knew what I had within 5 minutes! I am cured.

Thank you Dr. Jabbour and especially the incredible resident Dr. Geoffrion for your expertise, kindness and making me feel so reassured about my eye issue! I came in to see you for a Chalazion at the CHUM - also the wait time was super quick. Thank you for the work you both do.
Top doctor and surgeon . LASIK went very smoothly !
Hi! One of the best doctors I ever met. Very knowledgeable, very kind and respectful. I highly recommend him!
Médecin chirurgien rassurant, calme et compétent. Je me suis senti entre de bonnes mains immédiatement lors de notre première encontre. Ma chirurgie de cataracte s’est passée à merveille.
Dr Jabbour performed LASIK on my eyes. My prescription was -8 in both eyes. I am now glass free. Thank you Dr Jabbour and his team at Lasik MD. I felt safe from start to finish. Highly recommended!

I cannot but agree with all the comments. This doctor did a graft on my right eye for keratoconus a year ago. It’s a pleasure to have him as my surgeon. He is caring, compassionate and knowledgable. We need more similar doctors. DO
Dr Jabbour a une approche humaine, profesionnelle et méticuleuse. Je n’aurai pas pu demander meilleur chirurgien pour mon opération Lazik.
Il est excellent, que dire de plus! Satisfaite de mon opération de la cataracte. Au-delà de mes espérances.

Médecin très compétent et rassurant. Très occupé mais je trouve qu’il demeure toujours disponible pour bien répondre aux questions. Mes chirurgies de cataractes étaient un succès. Je le recommande sans hésitations.

Dr. Jabbour is perfectly bilingual, professional, reassuring, caring, encouraging, and attentive to his patients’ needs. You are in good hands with this doctor. I strongly recommend him. His team was amazing as well. 

Dr. Jabbour est parfaitement bilingue, professionnel, rassurant, encourageant, et dévoué pour les besoins de ses patients. Je vous le recommande fortement comme docteur. Vous êtes entre bonnes mains. Son équipe est très douée aussi.

Dr S Jabbour operated on my eyes and implanted trifocal lenses two weeks ago at lasik MD. Best gift ever! I wish I got this done years back. I was able to see perfectly from day 1 after the surgery from far and close. Best doctor and team!

Le Dr. Jabbour est très compétent et rassurant. J'ai eu une très belle expérience à Lasik MD grâce à lui et son équipe.

Je le recommande fortement.

Je me sens privilégiée de l'avoir comme médecin. Je vois Dr Samir Jabbour très souvent pour une infection grave de la cornée. Son dévouement et ses soins pour ses patients sont exceptionnels. Mon rétablissement est difficile et lent, mais au moins je me sens entre de bonnes mains...

I could not thank you enough for the care that you provided. I was bothered with glare to the point that I could not drive at night anymore and was bothered by light to to Fuchs disease. My experience with Dr Samir Jabbour and his team at Laservue was outstanding. Reassuring, warm and professional. I felt in good hands from the moment I walked in. I am very happy and highly recommend him and the clinic!

Dr. Jabbour m’a opéré des cataractes pour les deux yeux le même jour, ce qui n’est pas très connu et habituel selon beaucoup de gens. Tout est très bien passé et ma vue est devenue meilleure même qu’avant d’avoir la cataracte.

Ce que j’ai apprécié chez ce jeune médecin, à part son professionnalisme , c’est son côté humanitaire, rassurant et attentif aux problèmes des patients.

Dr Jabbour saw me at his clinic in Berri. He took the time to explain everything. He treated my dry eyes then offered cataract surgery when the dry eyes got better. Dr Jabbour m'a opéré des cataractes. Il m'a posé des implants multifocaux (Vivity). Depuis, ma vie a changée. Je suis capable de fonctionner sans lunettes de loin et de près. Grâce à son expertise et son professionalisme, ma vie a changé et je suis infinément reconaissante.
Five stars to Dr Jabbour and his team at LMD Laval! I recommend him for LASIK
Service superbe. Medecin compétent et humain. Il me suit pour une maladie de la cornée (keratocone) et m'a offert un traitement rapidement avec toutes les explications. Très rassurant de A a Z!

Je suis infinément reconnaissante à ce docteur qui a opéré ma mère pour une cataracte très avancée, dont deux autres ophtalmologistes ont refusé d'opérer. La chirurgie était un succès. Sa vie a changé. Merci merci!
Attentive and detail oriented. I had LASIK with him. He is very professional. I would recommend him to family members.
Dr Jabbour m'a opérée pour une greffe de la cornée et j'ai beaucoup apprécié sa manière humaine et intelligente d'interagir avec moi. Je recommande !

Had my laser surgery done in downtown Toronto. Amazing doctor . The operation felt like it was being done by professionals.

Incroyable service à LASIK MD. Dès que j’ai mis les pieds chez LASIK MD, je me suis tout de suite senti en confiance. Les employés sont vraiment gentils et prennent le temps de nous expliquer toutes les étapes à lesquelles s’attendre. L’opération s’est très vite déroulée, un petit 10 minutes sans aucune douleur et le tour était joué. J’avis vraiment peur avant l’opération et honnêtement, je n’aurais pas dû, c’était vraiment sans soucis.. J’ai eu ma chirurgie avec Dr. Mark Cohen la semaine passé et je tiens à souligner son travail qu’il fait avec beaucoup de professionalisme et entregent. I had my Lasik surgery done with Dr. Cohen at the Lasik MD clinic in downtown Montreal. I was nervous but Dr. Cohen took the time to explain the procedure and relieved any stress I had about the surgery. I highly recommend Dr. Cohen and Lasik MD for all your vision correction needs!!

Dr. Cohen and the Staff were amazing! the procedure was quick and I felt at ease throughout the entire process. I wish I did the procedure sooner! Would highly recommend!

Dr cohen was really helpful. The procedure was a life changer. His professionalism and abilities made the procedure more successful. I will forever be thankful for his help. Also with all the staffs. Highly recommended!

Excellent professionnel de la santé, il prend le temps d'expliquer les risques et d'expliquer le processus de guérison, il se soucie de la santé oculaire des patients, il est agile, habile et très expérimenté
I am so pleased with my results after my eye surgery with Dr. Cohen. He explained everything, the procedure was quick and painless. I am very happy with the results!

Dr. Cohen did both my surgeries. I just did a touch up on one eye about a month ago and I am so pleased with my results! Dr. Cohen was very friendly, professional, and the whole procedure was very quick and painless. The staff at Lasik MD is and always has been wonderful since my first visit. I 10/10 recommend!
Very helpful and knowledgeable. Provided a thorough explanation and answers to answers. Exceptional work, great staff, nice clinic.

Words cannot describe my gratitude to Dr.Cohen and his staff. I had a more complex procedure due to an accident I did when I was younger. The amount of professionalism and reassurance that I received from Dr. Cohen was more than I could ask for. Prior to seeing Dr. Cohen for a consult, I was rejected by 3 other doctors who did not want to perform the surgery. I was determined to find someone and drove from Toronto to Montreal just to have a consult. Best decision I ever made. He explained the procedure and agreed to do the surgery without any hesitation. I had 2 procedures done by him, one including an enhancement surgery (he personally came in during Covid just to do my surgery as this was something I wanted done as quickly as possible) and my vision is 20/20! From being told you will never get eye surgery and then coming out with 20/20 is a dream I never thought would happen. Thank you again for your care and expertise! Forever grateful.
Super professional and kind. Excellent work. Highly experienced and well versed. He also teaches the procedure at McGill.
Life changing. Recommend to anyone sick of glasses. This care taken during covid was outstanding. Felt safe and well taken care of. No stress at all.

Remarkable Doctor, extremely intelligent, a true man of science, I wish for more Doctors like him. I was faced with extremely high pressure in my right eye. Others tried it all, with no results, after many attempts, actually instead of going low it went higher, walking into his office with the pressure of 47, he estimated he would go down to 17, in actual fact, it was 14, and this only took less than 15 minutes while others 2 months later with higher and higher results. But! the results speak for itself. He will not stop until there is no more reason not to go further, while others just call it quits, I only wish I knew Dr. Mark Cohen, earlier in my life. I believe this is a doctor should be awarded the noble prize winner for a genius of our time.

I was recommended to Dr. Cohen by two of my aunts who had their laser eye procedures performed by him. It was an excellent choice as he was clearly experienced. This made me feel at ease. 

Laser eye surgery was the best thing I've ever done for myself. I'm able to fall asleep whenever I want and not worry about contacts in my eyes. This surgery is absolutely life changing and I recommend it to anyone who wears glasses. 

At Lasik MD the staff were super friendly and helpful, answering all of my (and my boyfriend's) questions.
Excellent Dr and excellent results! I Strongly recommend to anyone with glasses.

Excellent doctor, lasik surgery went very well and I now have 20/20 vision . It's been 5 months since I had my surgery and I have not experienced side effects. Very happy with my decision to get lasik.

My Husband had his first Cataract removed by Dr. Cohen September 27, 2019. The staff at his Clinic are fantastic, easy to talk to and make you feel very at ease. My experience at the Downtown Toronto office for surgery with Dr.Cohen was incredible. Dr. Cohen and all the staff made sure I was comfortable and knew what to expect every step of the way. The process was simple yet detailed. Quick, yet precise. The surgeon who operated on me was Dr. Mark Cohen. He explained to me in details the processes and took the time to make sure I was ok before moving to the next steps.

I had surgery on March 20th and I am an employee of Lasik MD.

GREAT experience, great doctor. I Highly recommend, do not hesitate.

I’m an employee at lasikmd and i’ve had my surgery with Dr. Cohen. Dr Cohen was super clear and very patient throughout the procedure. I previously had trouble seeing from upclose but now its no longer an issue. The staff members were great as well as the service they provided.

I had my surgery at Lasik MD on May 11th, and I can’t say enough how it was really one of the best things I have done. Not only was it quick and painless, it was also a great experience. The staff was so friendly and kind. They took care of me every step of the way; they did a few tests to make sure that I could proceed with the surgery. Dr. Cohen answered all of my questions and explained how the surgery was going to go, he kept me very calm during the entire process. Once the surgery was done his assistants took care of me while I waited to make sure I was okay. The entire appointment very smoothly, the Lasik MD team was amazing and I recommend them to everyone.

Dr. Cohen and staff did a great job at putting me at ease before my LASIK procedure. He was happy to answer my questions and guide me through the process of surgery. The procedure was quick and painless with excellent results and I would happily recommend others book surgery with Dr. Cohen. Prior to receiving surgery, I had the opportunity to meet with Dr. Cohen and ask him any additional questions which I may have had in regards to the surgury. Although I was still slightly nervous during the surgery, Dr Cohen carried out a conversation with me the entire time in order to help me relax and divert my attention from the unfamiliar experience. The procedure went by so quickly and smoothly. By the following morning, I was already able to notice a significant improvement in my eyesight. After wearing glasses for 16 years I can certainly say that Lasik was truly such a positive life changing experience.

Dr.Cohen was extremely professional and courteous. I was immediately at ease during the surgery as he talk me through the entire process calmly and clearly, therefore I felt secured and relaxed throughout the surgery.

I would recommend LASIK MD to everyone considering getting having LASIK Eye Surgery.

Ii has changed my life and will yours.

If you’re hesitating where to go for your Laser eye surgery I would definitely recommend LASIK MD. I had my surgery done a few days ago with Dr Cohen and everything went well. Super quick and zero pain, only a bit uncomfortable a few hours after surgery but go to sleep and you’ll be fine! At my appointment the next morning we saw I had a bit of inflammation in my left eye, which went away by the afternoon and I had fibres that were stuck underneath the flap in my right eye. They brought me back in that same afternoon and got a consultation with the surgeon and had it removed in 2 minutes with a simple procedure including water. He warned me it might be a bit uncomfortable afterwards but honestly I felt nothing. The staff is very approachable and professional. Loved my experience!

I was lucky enough to have Dr.Cohen and honestly he was amazing! I guess he could tell I was nervous so he was asking me all kind of questions during the operation to distract me from the surgery itself and little do I know after 5 minutes I was done. He was the best! The surgery itself is life changing, I wake every morning thinking I have my contacts in, every is just so clear even better than my contacts/ glasses. I honestly recommend everyone to do it! Nobody is a bigger scaredy-cat like me and now I see 20/20 !

I had my lasik surgery preformed by Dr. Cohen in the month of January. We had a little consult prior to the surgery where he explained the procedure in detail. He then warned me that I might feel a bit discomfort at some point during the surgery. I appreciated this of him because I knew what to expect during surgery time and I wouldn't be caught of guard. It really appeased me because I very anxious about the surgery. During my surgery, Dr. Cohen took his time and explained every step of the procedure. I felt very comfortable because he was very professional, he knew what he was doing and would continuously asked me during the surgery if I was okay or if I felt any discomfort, which was nice. I am very happy that i did the surgery because i can see 20/20 now and i no longer have to wear eyeglasses anymore nor squint my eyes. A big thank you Dr. Cohen. He did an amazing job.
Excellent and knowledgeable surgeon! Very professional with patients.

Le Dr Cohen a réalisé mon intervention LASIK en janvier 2018 à la clinique LASIK MD de Montréal. J’étais très nerveuse, mais aussi particulièrement excitée à l’idée de me débarrasser de mes lunettes. Après plusieurs examens le jour même de la chirurgie, j’ai rencontré le Dr Cohen, qui m’a rapidement expliqué en quoi consistait l’intervention. Ses explications ont été claires et concises et il a pris soin de s’assurer que je n’avais pas de question.

La chirurgie en tant que telle s’est déroulée encore mieux que je l’imaginais. On m’a administré des gouttes anesthésiantes pour que je ne sente absolument aucune douleur (je n’en ai d’ailleurs pas ressenti même après l’intervention). Je redoutais le moment où je n’allais rien voir pendant quelques secondes, mais j’ai été tout de suite soulagée de remarquer que ça se produisait graduellement. Le Dr Cohen m’a aussi aidée à me sentir en sécurité à ce moment parce qu’il me décrivait ce que mes yeux percevaient au fur et à mesure que ça se produisait. Il m’a aussi dit que je pouvais compter jusqu’à 15 avant de pouvoir voir à nouveau. Je me suis donc concentrée à compter après quoi tout était pratiquement déjà terminé. La chirurgie n’a duré qu’environ trois minutes par œil, après lesquelles je pouvais déjà constater une amélioration de ma vision.

Je recommanderais le LASIK et le Dr Cohen à toute personne admissible à cette intervention. Votre vie en sera assurément transformée.

très déçu de Lasik Md, petit caractère sur le contrat qui fait qu'aujourdhui les fameuses retouches garantis a vie sont en réalité qu'une arnaque... parce que j'aurais du savoir qu'après 5 ans je devais retourner chez lasik Md pour une vérification je dois repayer une autre chirurgie ... très ordinaire! aulieu de dépenser autant en publicité, arrêter de vouloir arnaquer vos clients et vos références viendront seul....

This Lasik MD felt like a revolving door. Once it is your turn they just throw you in the chair, do the procedure and then kick you out. Dr. Cohen also left a dry spot in my eye that after almost a year has still not recovered. I also viewed a mouse in that Lasik MD, as well as one of the staff members came out of the operating room wearing gloves to get a drink of water, then went back into the room wearing the same gloves...

I had my surgery done on November 23rd with Dr. Cohen, who made me feel at ease as soon as I walked into the operating room. Dr. Cohen explained the different steps of the procedure with much details and ensured I had no questions before we proceeded. Very well-experienced doctor, has a calm and reassuring personality which made me feel very comfortable throughout the procedure. The surgery was done in minutes and I did not feel any pain or discomfort. The end-result is great and I am very satisfied. Thank you LASIK MD!!!!
Very good doctor. Did not wait for a long time to see him.

After 15 years of wearing glasses and contacts, I finally decided to take the plunge and had Custom LASIK with Dr. Cohen on October 2017. The whole process was very well organized and the staff were very nice, giving me plenty of opportunities to ask questions, and I really felt that they were extremely diligent with their evaluation tests. I was slightly nervous when I entered the operation room, and Dr. Cohen did an amazing job in making me comfortable and keeping me distracted with conversation. Both him and his assistant, Deniz, worked very quickly and professionally - although they told me the operation would take 10 minutes, it barely felt like three! He also followed up with me again outside of the operation room, ensuring I can contact him with any questions. I'm still amazed how fast my vision improved, I rested most of the day after my operation but I was able to see perfectly clear and go back to almost all daily activities the next day.

I had been thinking of getting laser surgery done since a couple of years now, but I was hesitant to take the first step. I had been wearing glasses and contact lens for over 16 years so after completing my free consultation, I was literally counting the days until my surgery! I completed my surgery on September 21st 2017 in Montreal with Dr. Mark Cohen. Dr. Cohen, is very kind and professional and he really knows how to put his patient's at ease. I started to feel nervous after entering the surgery room and Dr. Cohen sensed this immediately, so he helped distract me during the procedure by discussing the history of Lasik MD. The surgery was quick and painless and we were done in a matter of minutes. I am very happy with the results and the service I received and I am currently convincing my brother to undergo the same procedure. Thank you Dr. Cohen and Lasik MD, for giving me a new and clear view on life!

I had my laser eye surgery done on june 21st with Dr.Cohen at LasikMD in Montreal, I am a very anxious person but the staff walked me through the whole process and were able to answer all my questions before going through the procedure which really helped to calm me down. I was also able to talk to Dr. Cohen before the surgery, he was quite nice and reassured me concerning the procedure. I am so glad I am now glasses free ! .

I recently got my vision corrected by Dr.Cohen at LasikMD in Montreal, his staff were super friendly and both them and him took the time to explain the whole procedure to me. After a few minutes I could not believe the results, I now no longer have an astigmatism and couldn't be happier with the results. I strongly recommend Dr.Cohen and LasikMD

On March 16, 2017 I was very fortunate to have Dr. Mark Cohen perform eye laser surgery on me. From the moment I walked into Lasik MD Montreal branch I felt welcome and at ease. The day of surgery, I did additional tests for precision purposes. The first step I was seen by an ocular specialist, Maher, he was very professional, informative and supportive. After meeting with him I did some more examinations with another technician, I then signed consent sheets, met with a surgical councilor; she went over the rules to follow, explained how to use the drops answered a couple of questions, and finalized with the payment. Afterwards, I was seen by Joel, a surgical assistant, he was very informative and sympathetic, he advised me that this was going to be a lot less nerve-wrecking than expected, it would be quick and painless (I must admit he was not lying). I then met with the surgeon, he explained the following steps thoroughly, asked if I had any questions and was extremely professional, which allowed me to feel comfortable with my decision of undergoing the surgery. The procedure happened; I was told it would last around ten minutes, it felt like three. Post-Surgery another specialist examined my eyes to confirm everything was well and finally I was on my way. I went to bed right after I got home, as I woke up I felt a bit of discomfort. The next morning I went back for the 24-hour follow up appointment at the Laval branch, (as it was more convenient). The receptionists Adrianna and Sabrina were very caring, I was seen right away by the optometrist, Dr. Carolyn she was extremely informative, and patient, she answered all my questions precisely, she also explained that I had dry eyes but with the Systayne eye drops it should get better otherwise there are many alterative solutions that can be considered should the problem persist. In conclusion, throughout the entire experience I was followed and reassured, I hardly had time to worry, I felt no pain and I no longer feel discomfort. I can now see perfectly without depending on glasses or contact lenses! Thank you Lasik MD staff for being informative, professional, supportive and caring and most of all thank you for giving me my vision back!!!

I had my laser eye surgery at Lasik MD Montreal on February 11th. The clinic atmosphere is very nice. Everyone I met with had a professional and charming welcome. They answered all of my questions and reassured me the entire way. I'm very happy I had the chance to have my surgery with Dr.Cohen. He's very calm, speaks softly, and very nice. For me his approach was perfect as he kept me calm by chit-chatting a bit. I’m very happy with the outcome. Already seeing 20/20 and glasses free!

I had my surgery with Dr. Cohen last week, and it was a great experience. The staffs were very nice and comforting. Dr. Cohen himself was very professional and attentive, he managed my expectations very well and definitely earned my trust. Now I can see so clearly, it's amazing.

My experience during the procedure with Dr. Cohen was pretty welcoming. The idea of going through with the surgery was nerve-wracking at first, and Dr. Cohen took notice as he sat me down and asked me if I had any questions. I didn't have any because so many things were running through my mind, but he was aware of my concerns and I appreciated his approach towards me and making sure I was comfortable. The whole process went by like a blur, but went great. There was also the right amount of staff helping around and making sure everything went by like a charm. I already thanked Dr. Cohen a few minutes after the surgery, and I'd like to solemnly thank him again for the work he has done on my eyes. The recovery process has been a lot less daunting than I was advised or that I expected. Kudos to Dr. Cohen and the entire staff for their hard work.

I have recently undergone Laser eye surgery with Dr. Cohen. I was a bit nervous right before walking into the surgery room but once Dr. Cohen introduced himself and walked me through the process I felt much more comfortable. Dr. Cohen was very amiable and made sure I was okay during the procedure. He might've sensed that I was a bit tensed during the process so he engaged me in a conversation in order to relieve my anxiety which truly helped. The procedure itself was quick and painless, the surgery was over before I knew it! Right after the surgery, Dr. Cohen did the final check and answered to any questions I had. It was a very good experience!

I have just recently undergone Lasik surgery and I have to say it is one of the best decisions I've made. I completed my surgery at the Montreal Lasik MD Clinic which was an amazing experience in itself. The staff made my stay very enjoyable and everyone was in such high spirits. My surgeon was Dr. Mark Cohen and he was excellent. He was approachable and answered all of my questions in order to calm my nerves. He even carried on a conversation during the procedure to help alleviate my stress. He works in a professional manner, and I am grateful to have been matched with such an excellent surgeon. I recommend this surgery to anyone who is deemed a candidate and I would recommend Lasik MD.

J'ai eu ma chirurgie le 19 mars a Lasik MD Montréal et je ne vous cacherai pas que j’étais anxieuse mais heureusement le Dr Cohen a su me rassurer. Il a su me détendre , me calmer et me rassurer avant de reprendre son travail. Se fût la meilleure décision que j'ai prise de ma vie; non seulement la chirurgie a été sans souffrance mais surtout cela c’est passée très rapidement. C'est tellement merveilleux de bien voir que je joue maintenant avec mon conjoint à : Qu'est-ce que je vois ! Je conseille cette chirurgie à tout le monde. Dr. Cohen est expérimenté et a un grand cœur : il se souci de notre bien-être.! En plus j'ai réussi à ne pas prendre de calmant, moi qui est anxieuse de nature dans la vie. Allez-y…n’hésitez pas à voir clair
Professionnel, motivé, connaisseur, disponible et a l'écoute! Absolument impeccable comme médecin. Chapeau!

I had my surgery with Lasik MD on Saturday September 19th. I was very happy with my surgery. I requested a specific procedure on the day of and Dr. Cohen approved which made me very happy. He was very punctual in time and also explained to me in the surgery room a little bit of information from my chart that I have a good prescription and have less then 5% chance of an enhancement which is encouraging. He told me what do, where to look and was even making covnersation during the surgery which calmed me down as well. Very good surgeon considering I see 20/20 within 24hrs. I am ecstatic that I had the surgery done i feel like everything i look at is in high definition. \i feel as if my new vision is a new beginning because it feels even more clear then the vision i had with my glasses and contact lenses. Thank you Dr.Cohen and the Lasik MD team.

A few days ago, I had Lasik surgery with Dr. Cohen at Lasik MD. That was the most amazing experience of my life and I am extremely happy with the results. Dr. Cohen took the time to go over the procedure in details with me and was able to reassure me throughout the procedure. He did the surgery with such ease that I didn’t feel any anything. In less than 10 minutes the surgery was over and there was no pain involved. The next day, when I came for a check-up, I had perfect vision and I could not be happier. I would recommend Dr. Cohen to everyone, he is an incredible surgeon!!!!

I was so sceptical about the whole process but I had my laser surgery 2 weeks ago with Dr. Cohen and didn't get the result expected in 1 of my eyes. I was told at a follow-up appointment to give it time and so on but just this week Dr. Cohen reviewed my file and called me in to get a touch up in the eye that wasn't perfect. Needless to say I was very happy, surprised at the follow-up and thoroughly impressed. My vision, less than 24 hours after the surgery is absolutely amazing. Thank you Dr. Cohen!!

I had my surgery a few days ago and I literally have no words that could possibly describe how happy and excited I am about my whole experience and most importantly, my new vision!!! Before going in for my consultation, I was somewhat skeptical about the surgery, but needless to say, the skepticism went away the moment I met with the specialists at the clinic! I must admit though, that even right before going in for my surgery, I didn’t expect my vision to be any better than it was with glasses, but oh was I wrong! Less than 24hrs after my surgery, I already had 20/20 vision and never in my life have I seen things so clearly and sharp. My vision is now far more better than it was with glasses or contact lenses. I was excited to look at the trees outside my house, read the street signs, and I can’t seem to wipe the smile off my face as I’m writing this. I still can’t wrap my mind around the fact that I can see so well now and the feeling is absolutely amazing! 

Dr. Cohen was very friendly, professional and made me feel comfortable. He made sure to answer all of my questions and concerns before the surgery and then, just like that, it was over in 5 minutes. I would recommend Dr. Cohen to everyone, he is truly incredible! 

The surgery was not painful at all, and even when the numbing drops wore off after the surgery, I was not in any pain either. I just felt like my eyes were a bit dry and I saw a bit blurry, but that all went away after I took a little nap when I got home. If you are hesitant to get the surgery, don’t. Just do it! People used to tell me it changes your life, and I never really took it seriously, but after doing it, I have to say it really does change your life, more than you’d expect, and I hope anyone reading this will be inspired and get their surgery too. You won’t regret it! :) Thank you Dr. Cohen and Lasik MD!!!!

My Lasik surgery went so well I didn’t even notice the time! I was up before I could realise it was over! I was confident in my surgeon, who took time to make sure I had no more questions before he proceeded with operating my eyes. I had a great experience at Lasik MD Montreal, all the staff was friendly and professional and I knew I made the right choice as soon as my first encounter in the clinic. Thank you Dr. Cohen and Lasik MD Montreal for my more than perfect vision!!

J'ai eu la chirurgie au Laser récemment avec Dr Cohen. Même si j'étais un peu nerveuse en début d'opération, Dr Cohen a su comment me rassurer en me posant des questions sur moi et en me parlant tout au long de la procédure. La chirurgie a été d'une courte durée et je n'ai ressenti aucune douleur. Je vois maintenant 20/20 et je ne pourrais être plus que combler. Je recommande à n'importe qui de subir la chirurgie et je recommande amplement Dr. Cohen.

I had Lasik surgery with Dr. Cohen recently. I also, asked him to distract me in order to keep me calm and he was more than receptive in responding to this request. To my surprise, he had me at ease
enough to discuss destinations I have traveled to. The surgery was painless and the results are nothing of short of incredible. Prior to surgery I had severe myopia. I have been wearing glasses since the age of 3. After surgery, I was confirmed with having 20/20 vision. I couldn’t be happier with my results and how I was treated as a patient. Dr. Cohen was equally professional, as he was approachable. I would recommend him to a friend in a heartbeat.

I recently had Custom LASIK performed by Dr. Mark Cohen at LASIK MD Montreal and I am thoroughly impressed. My experience with him was very professional yet human. From beginning to end, the LASIK MD staff was courteous and genuine and I only have them to thank for putting me on the path to a life with no more glasses.

J'ai subi ma chirurgie en aout 2014. Dr Cohen a pris le temps de réviser mon dossier et de me conseiller quant au choix de la procédure la plus optimale pour moi. Il a été courtois et attentionné pendant toute la chirurgie, ce qui fut rassurant.
Aujourd’hui, j’ai une vision qui est au-delà de mes attentes. Les lunettes et les verres de contact ne m’ont jamais donné la même satisfaction. Je suis très reconnaissante envers Dr Cohen et toute son équipe!

Ma chirurgie lasik s’est déroulée le mercredi 3 Septembre 2014 avec le Dr Mark Cohen. En arrivant dans la sale d’attente, je n’ai attendu qu’une minute avant de me faire appeler par la conseillère chirurgicale qui m’a très précisément informé sur la chirurgie. Le tout a débuté par une explication de la procédure, par la suite nous avons fait chaque étape tout en discutant, ce qui m’a détendu et calmé. Il m’a par la suite examiné pour constater que tout s’était bien passé et j’ai pu retourner chez moi avec mes ‘nouveaux ‘ yeux! Merci Dr Cohen et toute l’équipe de Lasik MD !!!

J’ai subi ma chirurgie mercredi dernier avec Dr. Cohen. Dès le début du processus, j’ai été rassurée par un personnel compétent qui a su répondre à toutes mes questions. Pendant la chirurgie même, le chirurgien a continué de me rassurer. Le personnel présent dans la salle d’opération a été très compréhensif et attentif. Après avoir eu l’intervention, je suis restée une heure dans la salle d’attente pour faire des derniers tests afin de vérifier que le début de guérison se passait bien. Je tiens à remercier toute l’équipe de Lasik MD et surtout Dr. Cohen qui a su me mettre en confiance et me donner une bonne vision.

I`ve met with Dr Cohen for my Annual Exam and it was great.I Had the surgery about 4 to 5 years ago and needed to see how my vision was going .Dr Cohen was very reassuring and gave me clear explanation of my result.Thankfully my vision is still perfect. The staff was amazing from the beginning to the end just like on my surgery day, one employe even recognised me i was so shocked and happy. Thanks to all of you, and i have to say thank you for those cookies and apples !!!!Your patient Goldy DC ...... See you in two years .

I only have great things to say about Dr. Cohen. I have had my surgery with him and although he is busy and I probably waited longer to get him specifically, you do feel you are in the best hands. I couldn't be happier about the results of my surgery! The doctor and his team were truly amazing and I would absolutely recommend them should you want to do a laser eye surgery.

I recently had lasik done by Dr.Cohen, and I can't believe how amazing my vision is now!! From start to end, my experience was amazing. The clinic staff were genuine and kind, and Dr.Cohen took the time to answer all my questions before surgery and made me feel comfortable. I couldn't be happier with my new found vision, all thanks to Dr.Cohen and his excellent team!!!!

I have searched long/hard to find out what went wrong during the surgery b/c Dr. Cohen was never honest enough to tell me. I quickly became an annoyance for him & his staff. I was left on my own to handle the horrific distortions that I have until now yrs later. The LasikMD OD who evaluated me said I was a good candidate and so did Dr. Cohen. I was informed of risks only in print & verbally sold LASIK and encouraged to proceed. I did not consent to the nightmare that I am currently living every waking/sleeping moment. I should have been refused in the first place but my money was more important to them than the health of my eyes. I know this now after consulting all experts in the city. My corneas are now permanently sick, dry and misshaped. I cannot warn you enough to stay away from this surgery in general & Dr. Cohen in particular. Despite high likelihood of success you will be putting your quality of life in jeopardy. Believe me when I say that a failure will make you a handicap.

I had my surgery in December with Dr Cohen and had never met a surgeon that was so attentive to his patients. He took the time to explain the whole procedure to me and explain all the risks and benefits. He put me at ease and managed to calm me as I was very nervous! Even during the surgery, he was walking me through the steps so that I would always know what was happening. It ended up being fast and painless and I never regretted my decision. I now have perfect vision and am very pleased with the results. I highly recommend Dr Cohen to everyone, especially the ones that are very nervous and need the extra hand-holding, like me!

I had the surgery with Dr. Mark Cohen and I have to say that I was extremely amazed by his professionalism and his interpersonal skills. He made me feel comfortable which, significantly decreased my level of stress prior to the operation. He explained all that he was going to do in detail, and waited for me to be ready in order to start the intervention. The surgery went very well. There were more people in the room that I expected but it did not make me any more nervous. I would say that the surgery lasted for about 25 minutes in total and that the level of pain was close to zero. Overall, I had a great experience and would recommend Dr. Cohen to any of friends or family for their surgery.

The experience I had with Lasik MD and Dr. Cohen was great. Everyone was calm, knowledgeable and patient. I was slightly nervous before the surgery but Dr. Cohen did a great job talking to me, informing me and reassuring me. The surgery went very well, I couldn't be happier with the results, and I would do it again any day!

J'ai eu une superbe expérience avec Dr.Cohen et l'équipe de Lasik MD, c'est un homme très calme et il sait ce qu'il fait. Avant l'opération, la réceptionniste m'as expliquer le déroulement de la consultation et elle a fait de même la journée de la chirurgie. Dr Cohen was very knowledgable and was able to have me at ease prior to my eye surgery . I would recommend him and the whole staff at lasik MD anytime.

After years of putting off laser eye surgery, I finally gathered my courage and decided to go for it. After having asked around and visited a few clinics, Lasik MD stood out above the rest. Having the surgery with them was one of, if not the, best decision of my life. Gone are the thick coke-bottle glasses, gone are the days of suffering through contact lens use. I had the surgery nearly a month ago and see perfectly. I wake up every morning thanking Dr. Cohen and his staff for the wonderful care, the expert advice they gave me, and for the life-changing results. Dr. Cohen was wonderful from start to finish, and explained exactly what was going on every step of the way to reassure me. After a few painless minutes, I arose to see clearly for the first time in over twenty years! My only regret? That I didn't decide to go through with the surgery earlier. Thank you Dr. Cohen and Lasik MD for improving my quality of life!

J'ai eu le Lasik il y a une semaine et je suis très satisfaite. Ma vision est excellente, je vois 20/20. C'est Dr. Cohen qui m'a opéré à la clinique Lasik MD de Sherbrooke. La chirurgie me stressait énormément, mais il a su me rassurer par sa confiance et son grand calme. J'ai bien apprécié quand il a déposé ses mains sur mon front pour me calmer. Merci Dr. Cohen et Lasik MD de m'avoir libéré de mes lunettes et verres de contact. Grâce à cette chirurgie, je vois mon cadran le matin, c'est merveilleux!!! Je peux dire que ça change une vie! Merci encore!

My laser eye procedure with Dr. Cohen was remarkably fast and painless. He was sensitive to my anixiety faced to the procedure, and reassured me that everything was going to take place smoothly. He made funny comments here and there to relieve my anxiety, and before I knew it, the surgery was over. I even made fun of myself afterwards for over-reacting to the surgery considering that I have felt more discomfort putting in contact lenses in the past. I have perfect vision now, and I definitely feel like it was a worthwhile investment! No more foggy eye glasses in the winter! Woohoo!

J'ai eu ma chirurgie au laser lundi le 1er octobre à la clinique LasikMD de Sherbrooke. Le chirurgien opérant cette journée-là était Dr. Mark Cohen. J'étais particulièrement stressée et, disons-le, j'avais peur. Dr. Cohen a pris le temps de s'asseoir avec moi, tout juste avant la chirurgie, pour m'expliquer le fonctionnement, me rassurer et voir si j'avais des questions.
