C'est une chirurgie stressante mais, vu le résultat, je le recommande à tout le monde et je vous recommande fortement Dr. Mark Cohen.

J'ai eu ma correction au laser il y a quelques jours avec Dr. Cohen. Je dois avouer que je suis très satisfait des résultats. Ma vision est très claire et enfin je n’ai plus besoin de lunettes! L’accueil à la clinique a été chaleureux et ils m’ont expliqué en détail tout ce que j’avais besoin de savoir. Avant l’intervention, Dr. Cohen a pris la peine de discuter avec moi, ce qui a diminué mon stress. Tout au long de l’intervention, il m’a guidé calmement en me rassurant que tout se passait bien. L’intervention a été très rapide et sans douleur. Un vrai beau changement!

As a surgical resident, I appreciated and was impressed by the efficiency and thoroughness of the counsellors, the technicians, and Dr Cohen. I had LASIK surgery with Dr Cohen, and he was excellent -- taking the time to explain the technique, and putting me at ease throughout the procedure. I was very comfortable on both my preop and surgery days: everyone was very professional and the clinic’s atmosphere was very inviting. I am very pleased with both the experience and the outcome.

Lors de ma pré-évaluation, les employés ont su répondre à toutes mes questions. J’étais un peu inquiète pour mon œil qui louche, car il y a un risque que la chirurgie en accentue l’effet. J’ai consulté mon optométriste qui m’a rassurée à ce propos. Ma chirurgie a eu lieu avec le Dr.Mark Cohen. Il m’a accueilli en souriant et il m’a mis des gouttes pour geler mes yeux. Puis, il m’a fait la conversation, car j’étais un peu nerveuse. Il m’a expliqué les étapes du processus pendant qu’il les exécutait. J’avais choisi le LASIK-Personnalisé, car j’ai de très larges pupilles et j'aimais l’idée que cette technologie retire moins de tissu cornéen. Le moment le moins agréable, c’est lors de la création du volet, mais à part une forte pression sur l’œil, je n’ai senti aucune douleur! Finalement, le Dr.Cohen et les spécialistes ont vérifié mes yeux avant de me laisser partir à la maison. Que je suis heureuse d’avoir fait l’intervention! Ma routine du matin est beaucoup plus rapide! Merci Dr.Cohen!

J’ai eu mon intervention à LasikMD avec le Dr Cohen il y a 2 semaines. J’ai eu la chirurgie KPR. On a brossé la première couche de la cornée donc cela nous laisse sans aucune protection, cela a l’air effrayant, mais on ne ressent aucune douleur. Le chirurgien nous mets des verres de contacts en vue de protéger nos yeux des infections. Au fond le vrai inconfort a duré les 2 premiers jours et je voyais une grande différence quand à ma vision. Guéri, cinq jours après la chirurgie on m’enlevait les verres de contact et j’étais prête à retourner au travail. Au début, yeux étaient très secs, donc je mettais des larmes artificielles très souvent parce que je travaille devant un ordinateur à longueur de journée. Le Dr Cohen était très humain dans l’explication de la procédure.Je dois dire aussi qu’il a fait du très bon travail sur mes yeux de -4.75 à 20/20 wow! Je suis vraiment heureuse d’avoir enfin été libéré de mes lunettes et verres de contact. Je dois dire un grand merci au Dr Cohen.

J’ai eu ma chirurgie au laser il y a de cela 3 semaines environ. Je dois dire que je me porte à merveille ! Je ne croyais vraiment pas pouvoir avoir une vue aussi belle après aussi peu de temps. Je dois tout cela au Dr. Cohen qui m’a vraiment traité aux petits oignons. C’est un chirurgien très attentionné qui nous fait sentir à l’aise. Tout au long de l’intervention, il s’est assuré que tout allait bien de mon coté. Il a très bien répondu à toutes mes questions et c’est la première que j’ai une opération (j’en ai déjà eu 3 auparavant) et c’est incroyable comment cette opération est tellement simple et efficace, en plus d’avoir l’honneur d’être opéré par le Dr. Cohen. Merci beaucoup à toute l’équipe de lasik MD de m’avoir fait retrouver le plaisir de vivre avec une vision 20/20 !!!

I'm a surgical resident and have had exposure to every kind of Doctor and Dr. Cohen is one of the good ones. He performed Lasik on me last week and was very pleasant and helpful. He took his time to explain everything and made sure that I was happy with everything before he started the surgery. He talked throughout the procedure explaining things as he went. I couldnt be happier with my experience at Lasik MD or with Dr. Cohen. My only regret is waiting so long to have it done.

Cela fait près de deux semaines que j’ai complété ma chirurgie, et je ne pourrais être plus satisfait de mes résultats! Le lendemain de la chirurgie, je voyais déjà très clairement et ma vue n’a cessé d’améliorer depuis. Lors de la chirurgie, le Dr. Cohen s’est assuré que toutes mes questions ont été répondues avant l’intervention, et au cours de la chirurgie, on a eu conversé et cela m’a permis de passer un moment agréable pendant l’intervention. Je suis habituellement un patient très nerveux; je suis le cauchemar du dentiste à cause des aiguilles qui sont utilisées pour l’anesthésie, mais lors de cette opération, je me sentais en totale sécurité. Les résultats prouvent en fait que je n’avais rien à craindre. Je recommande cette procédure à tous ceux qui peuvent se le permettre, même s’ils ont une prescription moins grande. J’avais -1.5 sur chaque œil et je n’ai aucun regret!

I had lasik surgery with dr. Cohen 6 months ago and so far so good. i have close to 20/20 vision now. i did have minor complications from the surgery. i had a wrinkle on my right eye that was discovered on the 2nd day follow up visit. Dr. Cohen smoothened it out that same day. On my 2 weeks follow up, they discovered my left eye had some clouding. I think from what they explained, it happens when there is a small particle left inside the flap and your body sends white blood cells to destroy it - which actually is not a good thing. So they prescribed me a steroid drop to be used for a few days. I just did my 6 months check up, and they said they're looking good. I personally don't have any complain.

Le service que j'ai reçu chez Lasik MD a été exceptionnel. L'évaluation postopératoire en clinique est définitivement la plus confortable comparativement au compétiteur que j'ai visite. Les détails sur les types d''interventions possible, les risques de régression et les prix ont été clairement expliqué. L'accueil et l'environnement de la clinique sont remarquables. Le jour de ma chirurgie, tout m'a été révisé et confirme. J'ai été opéré par le Dr. Cohen, et celui ci m'a introduit de façon professionnelle et confortable. Sur la table d'opération, tout s'est très bien passer et je n'ai presque rien senti. Dr. Cohen a réussi à me détendre l'esprit et à lui faire confiance. Suivant le temps de convalescence, ma vision est maintenant nettement clair, je n'ai plus besoin de lunettes. Cela me facilite mon travail et ma vie de chaque jour. Je félicite Dr Cohen pour son excellence.

I had my surgery about a month ago at the Lasik MD in Brossard. The whole experience was great and would do it again if I was not seeing 20/20. The clinic was nice because it didn’t have a hospital feel to it- the music and televisions took my mind off of what could have been a stressful situation. The clinic staff seemed to care about me as a person and not as a number -they all greeted me with smiles and assured me that my questions would be answered. I had my surgery with Dr. Cohen. He is a wonderful doctor who made me feel comfortable about the entire process. He explained everything step by step in the operating room and asked me if I had any questions. He has a great way about him. I am a very happy patient now that I no longer need glasses or contacts.

J’ai eu mon intervention LASIK sur mesure le 18 mai dernier avec le Dr. Cohen, à la clinique LASIK MD de Québec. J’étais très nerveuse avant l’opération, jusqu’à temps que je rencontre Dr. Cohen. Il s’est assis avec moi, m’a mise très à l’aise et m’a expliqué en détail comment se passerait l’intervention. Tout au long de ma chirurgie, il m’a expliqué le déroulement, et ça m’a sécurisée. Le lendemain, j’ai demandé à revoir Dr. Cohen et il a été très disponible. Je suis enchantée des résultats; je peux pratiquer tous mes sports favoris sans lunettes ni verres de contact. Ma vision est excellente et je le recommande à tout le monde puisque la correction au LASIK a changé ma vie !

J’ai eu ma chirurgie le 21 mai 2010 et je dois avouer que je suis impressionnée des résultats! Question de coûts annuels, j’ai décidé de la faire et quelle décision géniale! Il faut dire que le temps que je sauve matin et soir pour enlever les verres de contact ou pour prévoir un voyage sont appréciées. Le jour même de la chirurgie j’étais plutôt anxieuse, mais tout s’est bien déroulé. Les employés de la clinique de Montréal ont répondu à toutes mes questions, et ce, à chaque rencontre. Dr Cohen a pris le temps de m’expliquer le déroulement de la chirurgie et je n’ai rien senti! Tout ça s’est passé très rapidement, mais j’étais entre de bonnes mains. Le lendemain, je voyais déjà 20/20 et je pouvais conduire. Toute ma famille me faisait peur en disant que j’allais voir des halos, ce qui est totalement faux! Aucune douleur, sécheresse ou complication! Je n’aurais pas fait ma chirurgie ailleurs que chez LASIK MD.

Il m'a souvent été mentionné par des proches que la chirurgie réfractive a été l'une des meilleures décisions prises au cours de leur vie. Je fais maintenant partie de ces gens. Malgré le fait que je connaissais les faibles risques de complications, la fiabilité des techniques de chirurgie au laser ainsi que la grande expertise de Dr Cohen, j'étais très craintive face à la chirurgie et ce, même quelques minutes avant mon opération. La conseillère rencontrée juste avant ma chirurgie a su répondre à toutes mes questions patiemment et est restée très calme malgré ma nervosité. Lorsque je suis entrée en salle de chirurgie, Dr Cohen a pris le temps de s'assoir avec moi pour me faire part de ce que je devais faire lors de l'opération, en me rassurant que la durée de la chirurgie est très brève et qu'il s'agit d'un exercice simple pour lui. Tout s'est très bien déroulé, ma vision était excellente le soir même de ma chirurgie et je suis très satisfaite de mon expérience chez LASIK MD!

J’étais assez angoissé le jour de ma chirurgie mais le personnel médical a su répondre à toutes mes questions. Le Dr Cohen m’a expliqué l’ensemble de l’intervention avant de débuter, et durant la chirurgie également. La chirurgie en elle-même est vraiment très rapide, 5 minutes, je n’ai ressentis aucune douleur juste une petite pression sur l’œil. Mon intervention a eu lieu il y a quelques jours seulement et dès le 2 eme jour j’étais en mesure de conduire, de lire, et d’être devant un ordinateur. Je n’ai plus besoin de lunettes et c’est vraiment plaisant

Tout d'abord,jvoulais dire que j'ai été très bien reçu à la clinique, le personnel a été professionnel mais ce qui m'a le plus plu était le professionnalisme de Dr Cohen qui a pris le temps de parler avec moi et de me rassurer avant la chirurgi.Cette même personne m'a expliquée pt par pt le cheminement de la chirurgie et, pendant le déroulement de la chirurgie, il a continue à parler et à me rassurer.Dr Cohen me posait des questions et expliquait chaque étape, ceci m'a permis de ne pas me concentré seulement sur la chirurgie et de relaxer.J'ai été très satisfait du déroulement de la chirurgie et de la l'approche aussi que ses assistants avaient (souriant et vous mettant à l'aise). Expérience très positive que je conseille à tous le monde surtout en considérant que je ne porte plus de lunettes(après 15 ans. C’est un soulagement et un changement énorme: maintenant à chaque fois que je sors de chez moi,j’ai l’impression d’oublier quelque chose,et oui c’est mes lunettes où ma myopie)

J`ai fait faire ma chirurgie Zyoptix avec le Dr.Cohen le 8 mai (le chiffre 8 est mon chiffre chanceux et les événements heureux se produisent généralement à cette date). J`ai discuté de la chirurgie avec des gens et ils m`avaient vraiment mis en confiance.J`étais certaine que tout irait bien. Je suis si heureuse de ne plus avoir à porter des lunettes.De plus,avec la conduite automobile,ma vision de nuit est fabuleuse. Mon plus beau souvenir suite à la chirurgie fut lorsque je me suis levé le lendemain matin et que j`ai peu admirer à l`arrière de ma cour la couleur et les détails des feuilles des arbres. Wow!! Je n`oublierai jamais ce feeling.On ne peut espérer plus beau cadeau. Merci Lasik Md!

Dr. Cohen was an excellent surgeon, took the time to make sure i had no questions before the surgery and also made sure i was doing well during the procedure. He really lets you know exactly what hes doing and couldnt have been any better! I would recommend him to anyone having laser eye surgery!

J'ai eu ma chirurgie avec ce chirurgien et je suis impressionné par son efficacité! J'avais des particularités peu fréquentes pour ma chirurgie Lasik et il a su exactement trouver LA solution pour que tout se passe bien. Chapeau! On voit qu'il a beaucoup d'expérience dans ce type de chirurgie. J'ai trouvé la chirurgie plus agréable qu'une visite chez le dentiste! Pour ce qui est de son équipe, rien à reprocher. Ils sont tous compétents et savent nous mettre à l'aise.

D’abord je dois dire que le personnel de la clinique Lasik Md est formidable. Le service y est offert de façon personnalisé et le personnel est très rigoureux. Pour ce qui est de la chirurgie en temps que tel, j’ai trouvé que le chirurgien ainsi que ses assistantes faisant en sorte de la rendre la plus agréable possible pour moi. Effectivement, Dr. Mark Cohen à prit le temps de discuter avec moi et de m’expliquer la chirurgie. Il s’est assuré que je n’avais pas de questions avant de débuter l’intervention. Lors de l’intervention qui vu très rapide Dr Cohen m’a donné des directives très claires et simples à suivre et me renseignait sur la progression de l’intervention. Je n’ai ressenti aucune douleur et j’ai été très bien préparé à la chirurgie par tout le personnel. Ainsi, je n’ai eu aucune surprise. Je puis dire que je ne regrette absolument pas mon expérience et que je n’hésite pas à recommander ce chirurgien ainsi que cette clinique très professionnelle.

Cela fait 5 ans que j'ai eu ma chirurgie chez LASIK MD avec le Dr. Cohen et je ne regrette en rien mon choix. Il a été des plus attentifs avec moi alors que j'étais quelque peu nerveuse. Il m'a fait sentir que j'étais importante pour lui et pas qu'un numéro. Depuis ce temps, ma vision est de 20/20 et je lui en suis très reconnaissante. Le service des employés de LASIK MD était excellent ! Je n'ai rien à redire. Bref, je recommanderais le Dr. Cohen à d'autres membres de ma famille ou à des amis.

Je suis entierement satisfaite de ma chirugie et j'en remercie Dr. Cohen. J'etais tres nerveuse et avais beaucoup de question et il a su prendre le temps de repondre a chacune d'elle pour que je puisse ensuite faire un choix eclaire. C'est une grande decision que de remettre ses yeux entre les mains d'un specialiste, et je dois dire qu'il a ete tres professionel et mes resultats sont incroyable. J'avais une forte myopie et maintenant, je fonctionne sans lunette, chose impossible auparavant.
Je suis tres satisfait des resultats de ma chirurgie. Le docteur ma rassure at ma mis a laise. Je recommende la chirurgie au laser et lequipe de LASIK MD en particulier sans reserve.
I am THRILLED with my results! This doc is THE guy in his field. I would recommend the Zioptics procedure that I had for my high nearsightedness to anyone qho qualifies. Thanks a bunch Dr. Cohen!

I am a McGill medical student who saw Dr. Cohen as a LASIK patient. Not only am I ecstatic about my vision after surgery, but Dr. Cohen was great about answering all of my questions. But he has also helped me out in other importnat ways. I see that some people who do not know him at all, have mentioned that Dr. Cohen, who performs a private (non insured) medical service, is motived by $. I find this to be strange comment. Besides being a patient, I was also a recipient of a bursary for students in financial need. Dr. Cohen mentioned to me that he was a recipient of financial aid as a medical student, and has in turn committed himself to help out others as he was helped when he was in school. I find this impressive. He is helping out students in their time of need. I think that he is a great example of a model doctor. He is very smart (he was first in his class at our med school) and he gives back to the community. We need more doctors like him!

I had my surgery a few weeks ago. Although I am seeing 20/20, and very happy about it, I was not impressed with the surgeon and the following visits. The doctor in my opinion was rude and actually made a phone call practically on the operating table! My follow up visits were very long and I felt that the optometrist did not pay any attention to my concerns. I am happy about my vision, but if I had to do it again, I would have looked somewhere else or at the very least have a surgeon that is not only good, but also caring

I had my surgery on Friday and I am so happy. He is a knowledgeable Doctor and knows his stuff. he talked to me during the surgery and answered to my question patiently. I would like to thank him for giving me the new experience in my life.I referred 3 best frineds of mine.
I had laser eye surgery and was treated very well by the doctor. he was extremely knowledgeable and supportivethroughout the process.
Dr Cohen a fait mon operation et il ne semblait pas attentif et avait hate de terminer. Pour le prix de1750/oeil je m'atttendais a plus.

Very knowledgeable and seemed to know his stuff. He answered my questions to my satisfaction. Was reassuring throughout the procedure. Price was more expensive as I was a complex case but I was advsied of this at my examination. I am very happy with my vision and would highly recommend LASIK MD and Dr. Cohen.
I waited all day for my surgery. Doctor Cohen was very cold and did not seem to care much.

I had laser eye surgery at Lasik MD, they have a very well run oil machine shifting people through that place, they perform so many surgeries, unfortunatly you do not get to see the doctor unil the day of your surgery, so he was not able to see before hand that I had an eye problem that contra-indicated surgery, the optometrist who saw me before surgery knew i had this condition but didnt think it was a contra-indication for surgery, when in fact it was, I blame lasik md because of the system they have in place, you feel like cattle going there, just one more number on the list to do, they mut make so much money, why wouldnt you see a little less but spend more time with them???

I had laser eye surgery with Dr. Mark Cohen at LASIK MD. I cannot express my gratitude to Dr. Cohen and his staff. My vision is now 20/20 and it is amazing! Dr. Cohen explained everything in detail and although I was very nervous before the surgery, he made me feel relaxed and confident. Thank you, thank you.

Dr. Cohen is a compassionate, caring and a very knowledgeable ophthalmologist. He explains everything in easy-to-understand terms and is always willing to answer any questions you might have. He also has the best medical staff! I'd definitely recommend him to anyone who's looking for a great eye doctor.

I was referred to Dr. Cohen by Dr. Gomolin in the same clinic. From a very short sighted person with progressive cataract to someone who doesn't need any glasses seeing far, it's a truly life transforming experience. All the comments before me about how good he is are absolutely true that I don't need to add anything to it. I just had a follow-up check up with Dr. Cohen and he lasered my eyes to make them even better and I can tell you ever since I was 10 years old, I have never had such amazing vision! Before I left, I thanked Dr. Cohen with these words, 'Dr. you are a collaborator of God since you gave me two new eyes!'

Dr. Shawn Cohen has our family's highest esteem as a doctor, surgeon, and human being, for his consistent expertise, energy, and respect for his patients. I am lucky and grateful for having been referred to him some years ago. An award-winning prof at McGill, a devoted researcher at the cutting edge of his field, a calm careful positive person. He explains clearly, he listens well. He treats the person, not just the eyes. He is direct but never rude. I have never once heard him be rude, not to me, not to any other patient or staff member. His new location is not as convenient for me, and I miss some of his old staff, but the new place is well organized, and the trip is worth every step of the way. I would recommend Cohen to anyone who cares for the future of their vision. 5/5 from me, CB
my eyes were swollen ,he ignored my condition .made me feel like i was just complaining .

My family referred me to Dr Cohen

What a wonderful Dr he takes the time to explain the situation and puts you at ease

Very grateful that I’ve found him and he had availability to see me 

Many thanks

Dr. Cohen did a miracle for us. Last year around this time, I burst into tears in a grocery store thinking that my mum will never be able to shop with me because of her condition. She was so discouraged with the clinic that she used to go to. -The PREVIOUS doctor was awful and ethically questionable- Becoming my mum's caregiver for the first time in my life, I was stressed, anxious, sometimes frustrated, and perplexed. Our optometrist referred us to Dr. Cohen after learning how we were treated by the last doctor. After seeing Dr. Cohen, WE WERE VERY BLESSED and felt grateful that Dr. Cohen accepted my mum as his patient. I got the world off my back because we know she is in good hands. I am not in the healthcare/med field but I read all kinds of information/research because of my mum's condition. Dr. Cohen is definitely the top in his field, and very knowledgeable. He has the unique kindness and sympathy that most doctors don't have. I never believe in miracles but only in hard work. I am a skeptical person, but Dr. Cohen definitely did a miracle for us. Her vision was not restored as a healthy person, but she is back to the mum that I knew back then (She was stressed and anxious last year to the point that I can't recognize her). Med prescription is important, but a patient's psychological status will help to deal with the disease. Dr. Cohen is such a positive, encouraging, and inspiring doctor. The prescription that you receive during his appointment - that no other doctor is giving you - is support, confidence, and hope. I am grateful that he brought me back the mum that I used to have.  * Last thing to mention, Dr. Cohen's staffs are very helpful and patient. One takes on the attributes of one's associates. A doctor's work ethic also reflects on the staff.  Thank you Dr. Cohen!

Dr Cohen saved my husband's vision when no one else had the time to see an emergency case!!! 2 weeks ago my husband had only a few weeks to save the vision in his left eye due to severe glaucoma. So many referrals to glaucoma specialists were met with "we will get back to you after we triage in 4 weeks" or others who just didn't have time. My husband did not have 4 weeks to wait. Dr Cohen stepped up and took his case and operated within a week. 

He is such a caring man. He listened to us and answered all our questions and alleviated all our concerns. The surgery went so well as he is a highly skilled surgeon. Where we were so desperate 2 weeks ago, we can now sleep well knowing that he is caring for my husband. If you are lucky enough to see Dr Cohen, your vision is in the hands of the very best. THANK YOU, DR COHEN!!!

Dr Shawn Cohen is one of the best eye doctors I have ever met, and also one of kindest and most caring. I have total confidence in Doctor Cohen from a professional standpoint. And from a human standpoint I can't say enough. So once again, Dr Cohen is one of the nicest doctors I have ever met.  I look forward to every visit with him, because as I have already said, when I leave his clinic eye health/oeuil santé, I come away feeling just great.
Excellent chirurgien, très humain avec ses patients. Il explique bien les problèmes rencontrées lors des interventions.
I have been a patient for several years. Dr Cohen is frank very informative and i believe an excellent doctor. I am undergoing surgery with him and am pleased.

A PRIVATE VIEW

You'd be forgiven if Strength, Courage and inner vision don't come to mind when you think of the outcome of a cataract operation, but that's exactly what happened to me. I had 100% faith in Dr. Shawn Cohen's professional abilities and his professionalism; the problem was me. I was terrified going to the hospital. Dr. Cohen changed my mindset before and during the cataract operation. He turned it into a teaching moment. He had patience and knew exactly what to say to me. Not only did I walk out of the hospital with perfect vision he helped me discover my inner strength in order to tackle my biggest fear — hospitals. This is the difference between a good doctor and a great doctor. Dr. Cohen is a humanist. He gave me the ability to see the world and more importantly to see something in myself that I didn't know existed. I am so grateful for your outer and inner healing. Thank you Dr. Shawn Cohen.

I went to see another ophtalmologist for "dry eyes" ( I cannot produce any tears,
I was given some drops to lubricate the eyes. I returned the following year fo a follow up
this time, I was told I had developped glaucoma and also neede an operation for cataracts.
I was then sent to see a "glaucoma specialist"
I was given more eyedrops lo lower the pressure, and afterwards had 2 laser surgeries in both eyes. As it still disnt work, I was then told I neede surgical operation, and needed cataract surgery as well. At this point I asked for another opinion,
I went to see DR Cohen
he mentioned that surgery I was mentioned it didnt work, and I did not need to operate the cataracts either . He gave me a different medical treatment (different eye drops) , this was 2 years ago, I have a normal pressure.
We must work to clone DR Cohen, or bring some other medical doctors to get some up to date
in their studies.

Dr. Cohen was extremely professional and helpful when I got into his clinic for an urgency (I got hit in the eye by a bottle cap and my eye was completely red and couldn’t stop crying). I am definitely recommending him to all my friends and family.

Dr. Shawn Cohen has been treating my glaucoma for at least 8 years. It was diagnosed as severe in a routine general hospital exam done by an intern. Normally I might have been quite frightened by this news. However, being under the care of Dr. Cohen has given me great confidence. He is an exceptional, model doctor on more than one front. His exceptional medical expertise inspires great trust (I switched from another well-known specialist who was allowing my glaucoma to worsen). At the same time he us one of those rare doctors who listen to patients, relate to them with sincere warmth and the utmost respect and who genuinely take to heart the condition of the patient. One can feel his emotional investment in the improvement and stability of one’s condition. I moved to Toronto a few years ago but continue to come to Dr. Cohen in Montreal twice yearly for my tests and consultation with him. I shall continue to do so as long as I am physically able to travel. 

Trust in doctors does not come to me easily. I have referred my family and friends to him.

I have been seeing Dr. Cohen for 10+ yeas and have always received the finest of care and quick service. Since moving to his new premises at Oeil Santé, the staff and service were very efficient, knowledgeable and quite punctual. No waiting time at all.

I have been with Dr. Cohen for about 12 or 13 years. Dr. Shawn Cohen recently performed cataract and glaucoma stent surgery on my eyes. I am a 78 year old patient. I am very grateful to some friends who had recommended Dr. Cohen . I wish all Doctors would be like Dr Cohen with so much genuine care and good positive energy , he simply gave me back my life ! He is brilliant Doctor and I would not let anyone operate my eyes besides him Thank you Dr Cohen and Thank you Kathy

Being a great professional and a master in his technique is definitely a plus in the patient-doctor relation ship. I had heard about his expertise before. Dr Cohen tho adds a tremendous human approach to his profession. Attentive, listening to his patient, open-minded, he made me feel as if I was his unique patient in the world, almost part of the family. And this atmosphere of collaboration went on, from the consultations in his office to the operation room as well as in the follow up after the two operations.

The most heart felt thank you Dr Cohen for your great professionalism and and your so special personal warmth in a very delicate moment in one's life.

What a Great Doctor.

I initially went to see Dr Sean Cohen as per my optometrist’s recommendation. I had Glaucoma in my eyes that had to be treated ASAP. His Staff was fantastic and promptly booked me the first available appointment possible. 

I usually feel very anxious around doctors, but he took as much time as needed to make me feel comfortable. He also made sure that I understood my condition and the procedures of the treatment.

He is caring, compassionate, and truly cares about people and his work. Every patient gets the same personal care in that fantastic old school doctor style.

He also works with you to get you your health back. Given my age, being on the heavy side physically, and type2 diabetes which runs in my family, he always encouraged me to exercise as obesity has been linked with age-related cataract, glaucoma, maculopathy, and diabetic retinopathy.

Due to his encouragements, I went down from 361 lbs. (164Kg) to 237.5 lbs. (108Kg) in less than a year, through exercise and eating properly.

Thank you Dr Cohen for being such a great Person and Doctor.

N. El-Sebai
Best doctor I ever had. So nice. Co caring. Extremely competent. Amazing.

Courtois, humain, expert reconnu et professionnel hors pair, voici comment décrire le Dr. Cohen. Dès mes premières visites j'ai constaté l'accueil humain, courtois et amical que Dr. Cohen faisait à ses patients, les appelant par leur nom. Son écoute active, le temps qu'il consacre à expliquer clairement les problèmes de vision et comment il pense intervenir pour y remédier font de lui un professionnel hors pair. Il est totalement investi dans les soins qu'il prodigue. Il a réussi avec brio l'opération de ma cataracte alors que mon cas n'était pas simple puisque je cumule plusieurs problèmes de santé chroniques. Dr. Cohen démontre qu'il a la vocation indispensable pour être un excellent médecin . Je le remercie de tout coeur ainsi que le personnel de l'hôpital Lachine où j'ai été opéré pour leur courtoisie, leur efficacité et leur professionnalisme. Cet hôpital pourrait être un hôpital pilote pour son organisation sans faille.
Thank you Doctor Shawn Cohen - you and your team are absolutely amazing. I can see clearly now!! Gehane (Gina) Awad

Dr. Cohen hit the bullseye with my cataract surgery.. I now have near perfect vision..A skilled surgeon & a fine Human Being..

:)

I will be eternally grateful to Dr Cohen for his kindness and care. I have spent the past 20 years being seen by doctors but never heard. Dr cohen showed incredible insight and spent the time to explain what was happening, why it was happening and what we were going to do to fix the problem. He instills confidence, always has time for your questions and provides practical advice . Thank you Dr Cohen

As I was waiting for my cataract surgery, Dr. Cohen asked me if I had any pre-op anxiety and if I needed any medication. I responded simply by saying none was required because I had something far better than any medication in the world. He leaned over and asked me what that could be. My response brought a smile to his face when I answered as follows: "Dr. Cohen, you instill a sense of confidence that I have absolutely no fears whatsoever since I am being taken care of by someone who is absolutely professional and caring, and no drug could ever take the place of the serenity that I am experiencing right now." Needless to say, the operation was a success and I have the best visual quality of life experience that I have ever had from the past 70 years since putting on my first pair of glasses in Grade 5. With respect and appreciation for your expertise and humanity.
My visual fields have been stable now for 15 years. I doubt anyone else could have done this for me.

Dr Shawn Cohen, hier j'ai du passer un examen de la vue concernant mon permis de conduire. L'opération de mes cataractes fut un succès. Depuis, ma vue est excellente! Je suis reconnaissante d'avoir eu des soins aussi chaleureux venant de vous et votre équipe. Dr Cohen, vous avez la compétence + la bonté. Merci Dr Cohen

Je fréquente cette clinique depuis plusieurs années maintenant. JE ne pensais pas que médecin spécialiste et sympathique pouvaient cohabiter dans la même phrase. Je n'en reviens pas. I am absolutely thrilled with the service I received from Dr.Cohen and his staff. My condition was evaluated promptly & efficiently and cataract surgery performed at St.Mary’s. The whole experience was very impressive, being treated by a knowledgeable & compassionate staff during all procedures. Dr. Cohen performed the operation itself, explaining in detail what he was doing & why to an associate (it is a teaching hospital), which I found extremely interesting & at the same time reassuring. A follow-up visit the next morning was no exception. Extremely professional & efficient, taking the time to explain & answer any questions I had. I would not hesitate in recommending Dr. Cohen.

BTW: Vision in the eye operated on is now like HDTV compared to my other ‘Good Eye’ which I now see is only SDTV. Spectacular improvement and with absolutely NO pain from start to finish.

as a 77 yr old male an visiting dr cohen s office on three occasions i was gladly impressed with the very special care that dr cohen gave tp me, Also his staff at his office were very professional and polite in helping through before and after my operation thank you to dr cohen and his staff.
Knowledgeable, effective and takes Time to explain the pros and cons.

Excellent doctor. One of the best anywhere. Provides superb care. Extremely knowledgeable. Answers all questions in great detail. Always prompt. Instils great confidence should any procedure be required. Highly recommended. Five stars.

I had the very good fortune to have Dr. Cohen recently perform my two cataract surgeries. The results are miraculous and have changed my life. I've worn glasses since I was 8 years old and now at the age of 67 see perfectly. I can't say enough about the excellent care I received from Dr. Cohen beginning with our first appointment. He is what one would always hope for in a doctor - his knowledge, skill, dedication, professionalism, and the quality of care he provides are outstanding. I would also like to say that his excellent staff are a pleasure to work with. I am very grateful that he is my doctor and give him the highest of recommendations.

I've been a patient of Dr Cohen for many years. He performed my glaucoma/cataract surgeries and I have been doing really well ever since.

He is caring, knows how to listen and explain things very clearly.

He also has a good sense of humour which helps relieve the stress of tests and procedures.

I have been followed by a few ophthalmologists since my glaucoma diagnosis 20 years ago and he is one of the best.

I recommend him wholeheartedly.

Has serious limitations. Tries to be nice, but not really up to par with the best. Not an academic, not reliable during an emergency. I'm an elderly man and vulnerable, and I think he is too although younger. Probably a good doctor to most of his patients, he cares and does his best, probably a competent surgeon, but not stellar.

J’ai vécu une désagréable expérience avec Dr. Cohen. Lorsque j’ai appelé pour prendre le Rv dans son office la réceptionniste m’avait demande la raison de ma visite. J’ai clairement indiqué que je voudrais renouveler ma prescription pour les gouttes.
Arrivé sur place j’étais vraiment mal accueilli par le docteur qui en apprenant la raison de ma visite m’a donné un discours en quoi il n’est pas un docteur à signer les prescriptions, qui se spécialise en glaucome et que j’aille voir quelqu’un quelque part. Tout avec le ton de voix mécontent et rude. Bon, ce n’est pas écrit sur la porte de bureau qu’Il traite juste les patients avec glaucome. Et je ne suis pas supposée de savoir leur jeux de prescriptions. Mais je présume qu’il y a de quoi en arrière de tout cela. 
Bref, examen pour lequel je payé quand même 20$ pour le gouttes a duré 30 secondes. 
La dernière question quand j’étais déjà à la porte si j’ai des complaintes sur glaucome. Complètement pathétique!
Je ne peux pas le juger comme spécialiste mais son comportement vis-à-vis des clients est inacceptable.

The Doctor loves his work. His staff are very helpful. My 2 cataract operations are miraculous.

I am so thankful for the care at his office and St. Mary's.

I've been a patient of Dr Cohen for over 10 years now and have to say he is one of the most caring, concerned, professional and dedicated doctors I've ever dealt with. He has always explained things to me to my satisfaction and made me feel not only cared for, but also respected.

As a Cinematographer one can imagine easily how important my eyes are in so many ways - and I am certain the same is true of anyone. Our eyes are aws important as our heart and brain, or very close.

Having now just competed my second set of laser treatments for glaucoma I am incredible thankful for and pleased with the service Dr Cohen has afforded me.

Dr Cohen is one of the angels who walks among us - and I neither say this glibly nor jingoistically.

I recently had cataract surgery using the Alcon LenSx Laser Technology. The procedure was quite interesting and there was very little discomfort involved. Mon expérience avec Dr Shawn L Cohen Clinique Drummond pour 2 interventions pour mes Cataracte es très positive Ses connaissances et son expérience m'on vraiment impressionnés. I went to see him for cataracts. My left eye was not getting better. I went to see a new doctor for a consultation and when I called him back he refused to see me because I had seen another doctor. He is rude and arrogant. I don't recommend him.

Shawn Cohen is excellent. Clear, calm, keeps up to date and knows his stuff. A good diagnostician with (as mentioned many times here) a pleasant in-office manner; a very fine surgeon and teacher--he coached a senior resident through a portion of my cataract work. He responds to each eye on its own terms rather than according to a pre-set formula. I hope he teaches and inspires many, many ophthalmological surgeons over the next decades. His seriousness and his passion for his work are both very impressive. No doctor is perfect and all eye procedures carry risks. I trust that should there be intractable problems in future, Dr Cohen will be able to explain the limits of what can be done at the time.

Excellent Doctor and staff he was really kind all the time smiling and with a good energy, he is very professional and respectful, he knew immediately about my problem and explained me all very well one of the best doctors of Montreal.

I'm one year post-op for cataract surgery. My right eye is fine. My left eye however has a yellow haze, is always blurry and can only be refracted to 20/25 vision. My star burst patterns are worse now then they were before surgery and it's not safe for me to drive at night. I've lost major income streams because my sight is not good enough to fulfil required tasks. My eyes are great for watching TV. Too bad I only have rabbit ears. All doctors are "the best" when things go well. The minute my results were less than stellar, Dr. Cohen refused to answer my questions, appeared to mock my complaints and had no interest in helping me find out/fix what went wrong. CAVEAT EMPTOR.

Simply the best opthamologist and believe me I have been thru most of them in Montreal.amazing cannot say enough good things about him.he should be made an example to the medical students of what a doctor and medicine is all about
Dr. Cohen is the best doctor there is, hands down. He is caring, friendly, and a leader in his field. My cataract surgery was a complete success. I cannot thank him enough.
Have been seeing Dr.Cohen for the past 4-5 years. Have gone through 5 surgical procedures with him. He is an asset to his profession. Cannot say enough good things about him.

Dr. Cohen is a shining star. If not for him, I would be blind today. I developed glaucoma althugh I have no family history. He was patient and understanding as well as supportive with the decisions I made. I am amazed at how well his office runs even with his numerous commitments. Yes we pay for some of the services but we never feel like its about money. He is caring, curteous, and always knows his patients by name. Greets everyone personally and everyone is made to feel special. Even my dad likes him. He is not an easy patient to examine, but Dr.Cohen is amazingly patient. I would recommend his to anyone who needs to see a glaucoma or cataract specialist.

I have been under Dr. Cohen's care for 3 years for glaucoma. Recently underwent glaucoma and cataract surgery and am still in recovery. Dr. Cohen is a shining example of how a doctor's office should be run, courtesy and efficiency by the staff and Dr. Cohen really knows his stuff. I feel that I am having the best possible care available in Montreal.

Dr. Cohen was very nice and took the time to explain everything to me. I am a diabetic but I have always had high pressure in my eyes. He performed a type of lazer surgery and today I am fine. I had been elsewhere before and had been told that I would be on eye drops to control the pressure for the rest of my life, but after Dr. Cohen was finished with me I no longer need eye drops and my vision is great and so is my pressure. I would recommend this Doctor to anyone.
Very kind and compassionate. So is his staff. I had cataract surgery done by Dr. Cohen and was totally confident in his skill. Surgery was a success.

Treats all his patients with the utmost respect and courtesy, personally escorting all to his examination room. Never forgets a name, never fails to apologize if you are kept waiting. He knows his stuff, is very reassuring, offering solutions and options.
Dr Hamel est un beau cadeau du ciel pour ma fille. Excellent sur tous les plans.

Great services even stayed longer to operate on my case, very punctual always there when we need him and anwsers emails personally

Il prend le temps d'expliquer les résultats d'analyse aux parents dans des mots simples. Je me sens privilégié comme papa d'avoir un tel médecin pour prendre soin de mes enfants.

Dr. Hamel is a wonderful, competent caring doctor. He has gone above and beyond in the care of my son. We were turned away by another pediatric opthamologist who said he could not help with my sons condition. Dr. Hamel has not given up on my son and we are well on our way to a better quality of life for my little one.
Dr Hamel est compétent,compréhensif et toujours à l'écoute et sa disponibilité est très appréciée, il est à sa place et les enfants sont entre bonnes mains, il nous donne confiance`.

Un excellent médecin, toujours disponible. Il prends le temps de bien répondre aux questions. Il est calme et rassurant et assure un excellent suivi. Si tout les médecins étaient comme Dr Patrick Hamel, WOW!
Excellent pediatric opthamologist. Very competent and great with children.
Dr. Hamel is a wonderful Doctor. He answers all my questions without looking at his watch. He is really smart and knows what he is doing.

Dr Teboul is one of the best and hardest working doctors I’ve seen! She has a great reputation which is well deserved and yet she is so humble about it. Dr Teboul est une ophtalmologiste de première classe: humaine, compétente et toujours à l’écoute de ses patients . Je la recommande vivement.

Excellent results to my cataract surgery. Great surgeon, great team! Dr Teboul is just amazing and I highly recommend her. Wait times were actually very reasonable, was seen in less than an hour and was out of there in less than 2 hours with all the pre-op measurements done same day (free of charge) and a very thorough discussion about the surgery with Dr Teboul. J'ai beaucoup aimé la docteure Teboul qui m'a opérée le 19 février 2024 pour des cataractes dans chaque œil. Je suis retournée la voir ce matin, une belle réussite, je vois très bien. Merci beaucoup!
The waiting time is ridiculous. Had at appt at 1 and was only called in at 5

Excellents résultats à ma chirurgie de cataracte. L’équipe opératoire est très accceuilante et Dr Teboul a effectuée mon opération en toute douceur. Son excellente réputation est bien méritée. Merci Dr Teboul pour votre compassion et votre professionnalisme. Je suis ravie de ma nouvelle vision!

Starting off the year with clearer vision than I can ever imagine thanks to my amazing ophthalmologist, Dr Barbara Teboul. No words to describe how thankful I am that Dr Teboul is my ophthalmologist. Her great reputation is definitely well deserved. Merci au Dr Barbara Teboul et son équipe formidable lors de ma chirurgie de cataracte bilatérale. Elle à accroché ma cornée intérieur durant l’opération et elle me l’as avoué seulement après la troisième visite de suivi car je me plaignais que je voyais toujours embrouiller d’ailleurs trois ans plus tard et ma vue n’est jamais revenue je suis pris avec mon problème pour toujours
Excellent and efficient. She operated on both my eyes and those of my wife, with an excellent follow-up.

Le Dr. Barbara Teboul est une chirurgienne de la cataracte de premier ordre ! Son expertise et sa compassion envers ses patients sont exceptionnelles. I cannot express how impressed I am with the level of care and expertise provided by Dr Barbara Teboul when I consulted her for cataract surgery.

If you are seeking a skilled surgeon who genuinely cares about their patients' well-being, Dr. Barbara Teboul is the one to trust.

The waiting time of 2+ hours even though we have an appointment is extremely ridiculous. 

91 year old father !

I recently had the pleasure of being treated by Dr. Teboul, an ophthalmologist who specializes in cataract surgery, and I could not be more pleased with the care I received. I was so lucky to have found this amazing doctor in whom has performed an outstanding surgery on my eyes…little after this surgery I found myself with a brand new eyesight ….she is an amazing and knowledgeable doctor who takes the time to listen to her patients. The best hands down !!!
Excellente expérience pour ma chirurgie de la cataracte avec le Dr Barbara Teboul. Je me suis senti en confiance dans ses mains du début à la fin. Super équipe au bloc opératoire et à la clinique!
Excellente ophtalmologiste. Bilingue, souriante et compétente. Je suis très heureuse des résultats de ma chirurgie de cataracte. Je n’ai jamais vu aussi bien! Merci Dr Barbara Teboul!

Dr Teboul is the best in town for cataract surgery, according to the optometrist who referred me to her. Professional, competent, and caring, all the qualities I look for in a specialist. I had consulted other ophthalmologists before her and there is no comparison. Chirurgie de la cataracte. Tout a été parfait. J’ai eue la chirurgie de la cataracte des deux yeux. À deux semaines d’intervalle. Tout s’est très bien passer. Dr. Teboul et son assistant Dr. Lee , ont fais un travail 10/10. Merci à toute l’équipe.

An amazing and very "human" cataract surgeon who I am told is the best in her field. Judging by my experience, she certainly is! Surgery was actually a pleasant experience. Thank you ,doctor Barbara Teboul! You are great!Yesterday I had a cataract surgery.Today I can read and see without glasses!

La meilleure dans son domaine mais si vous avez un rendez vous à disons 10h00 le matin, libérez votre avant midi ainsi que le début d'après midi car vous attendrez minimum 2h sinon plus. Très mauvaise gestion des horaires de consultation.

Best ophthalmologist! She is the top in her field, especially if you need cataract surgery. Was a couple months wait for apt , but totally worth it for a lifetime of great vision. I had a beyond excellent experience with this renowned, highly sought after cataract surgeon. She is 5 star all the way and I recommend her without hesitation. Thank you Dr Teboul!
A truly great professional! Bravo! Her advice is spot on. The staff too is caring and courteous.
Each post-op appointment is a 2 hr+ wait for 2 minute checkup without apology…every time. It’s unprofessional. Most patients are seniors and the long wait on hard seating is difficult for them.

Dr Teboul is a true gem of an ophthalmologist. She’s a great surgeon with a great bedside manner. She is in high demand, so somewhat difficult to get an appointment, but if you get one, consider yourself lucky; you’ll love her!

Highly recommend this friendly, caring and competent ophthalmologist. My entire experience with her, from pre-op, surgery (for cataracts) and postop were top notch. Thank you for your kind care to me and to performing Cataract Surgery.

Quelle personne formidable. Elle hautement qualifiée, disponible et humaine. Je suis tellement chanceux d’avoir pu me faire opérer par elle. J’ai encore un œil à faire opérer pour une cataracte, mais je vois déjà la différence! Merci Dre Teboul.

This doctor is a gentle , kind soul with gifted hands who has literally changed my life since she performed cataract surgery in both my eyes this year. Je suis tellement heureuse d’avoir eu la bonne chance d’avoir Dr Barbara Teboul comme ophtalmologiste. Elle a des vraie mains de fée! Je suis absolument ravi des résultats de ma chirurgie de cataracte. En plus, elle est super sympa. 5 étoiles n’est pas assez pour ce médecin formidable!

Nothing negative to say about her competencies. Was all about 1.45hrs wait for post surgery check up. Not aware if this type of service could have been done virtually but the wait was not pleasant. Visited on January 28th.

Dr Barbara Teboul is the most competent, caring and human ophthalmologist that I have ever encountered. My daughter and i have the privilege to work with her , she an amazing Doctor , but most of all a marvelous person , she's kind , professional , in few words a beautiful soul.

Tellement contente que j’ai réussi a avoir un RV avec Dr Teboul! C’est la meilleure des ophtalmologistes.Tout le monde le dit, y inclu la multitude de patients satisfaits dans sa salle d’attente. Dr Teboul is an amazing ophthalmologist and very caring human being. Je suis extrêmement satisfaite de cet ophtalmologiste. I am so grateful to Dr Barbara Teboul for restoring my eyesight to better than it has ever been before without glasses! The difference she has made in my quality of life is simply astounding. I am starting off 2020 with 20/20 vision thanks to the skilled hands of Dr Barbara Teboul! She operated on me just before Christmas and it is the best gift I have ever received. Dr Teboul est une excellente ophtalmologiste, à l’écoute de ses patients et avec des mains de fée en ce qui concerne la chirurgie de cataracte. So happy I was lucky enough to get Dr. Barbara Teboul as my ophthalmologist and cataract surgeon She genuinely cares about her patients and has the best surgical results. Thank you so much Dr T !

I first met Dr Teboul 8 years ago when she saw my wife and diagnosed a brain tumour. She referred her for urgent treatment and literally saved her life in doing so! Dr Barbara Teboul is an excellent ophthalmologist and cataract surgeon who treats her patients with care and compassion. Dr Barbara Teboul est une ophtalmologiste sans comparaison. Patiente, souriante et toujours à l’écoute de ses patients, on se sens en confiance complète entre ses mains. Dr Teboul is definitely a 5 star ophthalmologist. She is gentle, patient and reassuring and takes the time to answer all your questions. She does not rush you out of her office as do many other specialists. Surgical results are excellent. All of my health professionals tell me she is the the best.

I was very satisfied with this ophthalmologist. She gave me my eyesight back just in time for Christmas. It’s the best Christmas gift I could ask for! She has a very gentle touch and made me feel at ease throughout the whole procedure.

Dr Teboul is a brilliant surgeon. May her hands be blessed so that she may continue to help

others to see as she helped me. I am only 49, but had rapidly progressing cataracts in both eyes. I never appreciated eyesight so much as the day Dr Teboul returned mine to me! I am forever grateful.

Dr Barbara Teboul operated on both of my parents, and I am so thankful too her for her great competence, her kindness, understanding and gentleness in dealing with my anxious elderly parents, and for her generally positive demeanour which made us always feel very comfortable. Excellent ophtalmologist and cataract surgeon! I highly recommend Dr Teboul. Very skilled, very gentle and very human.

Je suis ravie de mon expérience avec cet ophtalmologiste! Elle nous accueille toujours avec un sourire, et explique bien le diagnostic et les options de traitement. I was very happy with this ophthalmologist! She clinched the diagnosis on the first visit, a diagnosis many others had missed after several visits! My eye problem is now resolved thanks to her. She is sharp, actually listens to you, and is very pleasant to boot. Definitely 5 stars

Meilleur ophtalmologiste de la Montérégie! Je l’ai consulté à Valleyfield, rendez-vous très rapide, chirurgie de cataracte six semaines plus tard, et résultats impéccables! Je suis très satisfait du Dr Barbara Teboul et du personnel de l’hôpital qui étaient très attentifs et chaleureux.
Loved this ophthalmologist! Best cataract surgeon in town! I am lucky to have gotten an apt with her and I now recommend her to all my friends and family. Thank you Dr Teboul, I am forever grateful.

Excellente ophtalmologiste. Je suis ravie des résultats de ma chirurgie de cataracte, fait à l’hôpital de Valleyfield. Dr. Teboul est humaine, réassurante et très compétente. Excellent doctor, competent surgeon and wonderful human being! As others have said, she is definitely worth the wait! Eyesight is too important to take a chance, so I made sure to ask for Dr Teboul. Lachine and St Mary’s hospital were both great with excellent staff. No regrets!

This ophthalmologist and cataract surgeon is the best of the best! I was very impressed by her professionalism, her warmth, and her compassion as she dealt with my very anxious, unilingual, Italian mom.
