Dr Mydlarski est conciencieux, précis, expert. Je le vois depuis 8 ans, et il m'a toujours reçu avec la même attention. Mon glaucome ne saurait être mieux soigné. En plus, il parle bien français.

Dr. Mydlarski is an amazing medical professional whose first priority is the patient. Thank you Dr. Mydlarski! You act quickly and efficiently to correct my problem.
Thank you Dr Mydlarski for saving my eyesight when I had my glaucoma emergency. I really appreciate your expert care and the kind hospital staff that work together with you. T.S.

Dr Mydlarski did’nt diagnose my eye problem, a problem which had already been diagnosed by an optometrist. His low knowledge caused my vision loss.

He does not respect his patients , so that they should wait 4-5 hours for being visited.

best ophthalmologist in town.He is knowlegable ,explains the problem and takes care of it.I was lucky to have him as my surgeon.Thank you.

Dr Mydlarski est un excellent chirurgien et fait un très bon suivi. Dr. Mydlarski is the best. Highly recommended. Thank you.

Dr Mydlarsky clearly cares about his patients and takes the time to explain and discuss the best treatment options. I recently had cataract surgery and he found me an IOL that was perfect for my particular circumstance (I also have Glaucoma and have had laser surgery) and eye shape, with excellent results thank G-d. I found Dr. Mydlarski to be very thorough and also very knowledgeable. I had both glaucoma and cataract surgery. He was extremely conscientious even coming in on a Sunday when there was a problem. Un excellent docteur. Il m'a soigné pour le glaucome qui n'était pas aperçu parce que c'est une maladie silencieuse.

Il y a quelques mois, j'ai été opérée par le Docteur Marc Mydlarski pour des cataractes et glaucome aux deux yeux. Ma vision qui était autrefois faible et embrouillée est maintenant impeccable.  Charmian Paerewick

Il y a quelques mois, j'ai été opérée par le Dr. Marc Mydlarski pour des cataractes et glaucome aux deux yeux. Ma vision qui était autrefois embrouillée est maintenant impeccable. Je m'amuse à dire que j'ai des yeux bioniques grâce à ce talentueux magicien.

First visit in 2010 to rule out glaucoma provided benchmarks for developing cataracts which were effectively dealt with this year. Excellent pedagogical approach which is patient tailored and not condescending . He encourages his patients to research to the best of their abilities to acquire a good understanding of their ocular situation. 

 The results are excellent with, touch wood no complications. 

 Room for much improvement in office organization and punctuality. Having become accustomed to morning-long waits during all my previous visits, I was pleasantly surprised at my last visit to leave before 10 in the morning.

Dr. Mydlarski is a quietly confident man who manages to instill the same confidence in his patients. His manner of imparting knowledge is clear and reassuring. I was able to listen to him teaching a student during my eye surgery and and was impressed. His manner with his student was just like his manner when speaking to patients, informative, clear and concise. Its said that the mark of a good teacher is that he/she teaches in a manner where the students don't realize they have been taught. This sums up Dr. Mydlarski. He is a true professional in his craft. M. L. Nish
Médecin sympathique et connaît son métier. Répond aux questions. L'attente vaut les soins reçus, je dirais. Merci Doc
Stressant, vous n avez pas le temps de poser questions. semble à son affaire.pas encore opéré.

I would like to thank the doctor for taking car of my vision. He performed cataract surgery on both my eyes. The procedures were without complication, painless and I am extremely pleased with the results.

He answered all my questions with clear and easy to understand replies. He was pleasant and polite during every visit with him. His examinations were thorough and detailed.

He is an excellent doctor and a very nice person as well.

With my appreciation and thanks, Maria Sganos.

Je suis reconnaissante de la personne qui m’a référé au Dr. Mydlarski. En ce qui me concerne c’est un médecin très consciencieux et professionnel, ses explications sont claires et précises. Dr. Mydlarski is a phenomenal doctor with a great personality. I had cataract surgery on both my eyes to prevent glaucoma. I am lucky to have him as a doctor and waiting a long time to see the brilliant doctor is a small price to pay. He is knowledgeable, dependable ,caring and above all a great human being. NK

I want to express my sincerest thanks and appreciation to Dr. Marc Mydlarski for the amazing and ongoing exceptional care he gives me. ouvert aux clients.

He is fantastic, kind understanding and very thorough. You are in great hands with him!!

I could not ask for a better Dr. and assistant. He operated my glaucoma and cataract surgery perfectly. Though he is extremely busy, he allocates a lot of time to his patients, listening, explaining, etc... THANK YOU DR. MYDLARSKI. YOU ARE THE BEST. Robert Nasr

Dr Marc Mydlarski is the best. He has been my Eye Doctor for the past 5 years. Dr. Mydlarski has been instrumental in saving my eyesight. During my regular ophthamologist’s absence, Dr Mydlarsky kindly accepted me as a patient, despite his heavy case-load. He treated my post-cataract surgery inflammation effectively and was always sympathetic and gentle. One could not ask for a better doctor.

I was referred to Dr. Mydlarski , who was highly recommended. He is very thorough and meticulous , keeping his patients best interest in mind , while showing genuine concern for my eye health. His rating for punctuality is affected only by his thoroughness of each appointment.

He is an excellent communicator , readily answering my questions , while keeping me well informed.

He appeared to be a strong mentor to his interns and staff.

He has now steered me through 2 cataract surgeries , amongst other issues , with only positive results.

Based on my experience , you will be grateful , as I am , that you had Dr. Mydlarski as your Ophthalmologist.

Thanks again Dr. DS.

A true expert in his field, and a very dedicated, responsive, caring doctor who listens, as well. He is always careful, and methodical. He takes all information into account. He is excellent , yet approachable at the same time. He has to be one of the best doctors in Canada.

He's the best.

AN EXCELLENT DOCTOR WHO TAKES HIS TIME WITH EACH AND EVERY PATIENT. THERE IS NEVER A RUSH. DR. MYDLARSKI IS EXCEPTIONALLY THOROUGH AND VERY VERY CAREFUL. AN EXTREMELY GOOD DOCTOR AND YOU SHOULD CONSIDER YOURSELF FORTUNATE IF YOU ARE HIS PATIENT.

Did wonders to my aunt's eyes, honest, patient, great bedside manner, he is a great asset to his profession and to the city's healthcare system. My Mother and Aunt love him to bits. One of the best a++++++

Dr Tanguy Boutin [Comment in English will follow] est un chirurgien ophtalmologiste que je trouve très compétent. Bien sûr, me diriez-vous, il est médecin spécialiste, il est donc compétent ! Attendez ! Ce n'est pas juste de ses compétences techniques que je veux parler. C'est sûr que c'est important : après tout, on lui confie bien "la prunelle de nos yeux", au sens propre et figuré ! Je voudrais plutôt parler de ses autres qualités, de celles qui sont à un autre niveau, celles qui viennent compléter ses compétences techniques médicales (tout aussi importantes), celles qui font de lui un MÉDECIN-GENTLEMAN ! Je m'explique. Il a cette aura, cette qualité qui malheureusement ne se retrouve PAS toujours chez TOUS les médecins, celle d'expliquer clairement les choses, de les dire avec des mots que tout le monde comprend, de s'assurer qu'on a bien compris avant de poursuivre et de passer à autre chose, de parler à ses patients (et à ses résidents aussi), d'une voix calme et apaisante, etc. TOUT CELA EST TRÈS RASSURANT pour le PATIENT ANXIEUX qui se trouve sur la table d'opération, situation très anxiogène en elle-même. Cela nous rassure et nous met en confiance, ce qui, j'en suis convaincu, constitue 50% de notre satisfaction, contribuant ainsi à la réussite totale (100%) de l'acte chirurgical ! Cette "chose", Dr Boutin l'a. Nous l'appellerons : qualité psychologique et humaine. Au cours d’un processus médical médecin-patient, cet aspect est tout aussi important que l'acte chirurgical technique en soi. Je suis convaincu que Dr Boutin sait tout cela ! C'est sur cet aspect que j'aimerais que mon témoignage porte. Merci Dr Boutin, non seulement de m'avoir redonné ma vision d'avant cette cataracte handicapante, mais aussi de m'avoir redonné confiance en notre système de santé, confiance vraiment mise à mal pour toutes les raisons que nous connaissons tous, et qu'il n'est pas nécessaire de rappeler, ici. Au nom de tous les patients que vous avez soignés jusqu'à présent, je vous dis : Merci du fond du cœur !

[ENGLISH] 

Dr Tanguy Boutin is an eye surgeon who I find very competent. Of course, you'd tell me, he is a specialist doctor, so he is competent! Wait ! It's not just his technical skills that I want to talk about. Sure, it's important: after all, we entrust him with “the apple of our eye”, literally and figuratively! I would rather like to talk about his other qualities, those which are at another level, those which complement his technical medical skills (equally important), those which make him a DOCTOR-GENTLEMAN! Let me explain. He has this aura, this quality which unfortunately is NOT always found in ALL doctors, that of explaining things clearly, of saying them in words that everyone can understand, of making sure that we have understood well before continuing and moving on, to speak to his patients (and residents as well), with a calm and soothing voice, etc. ALL THIS IS VERY REASSURING for the ANXIOUS PATIENT who is on the operating table, a very anxiety-provoking situation in itself. This reassures us and gives us confidence and calmness, which, I am convinced, contributes largely to the entire success (100%) of the surgical procedure! This “thing”, Dr Boutin has it. We will call it: Psychological and Human Quality. In a doctor-patient medical process, this aspect is just as important as the technical surgical procedure itself. I am convinced that Dr. Boutin knows all of that! This is what I'd like my testimony to focus on. Thank you Dr. Boutin, not only for giving me back my vision before this debilitating cataract, but also for giving me confidence in our health system, a confidence that has really been undermined for all the reasons that we all know, and that there is no need to recall here. In the name of all the patients you've cared till now, I say: Thank you from the bottom of my heart!

J'avais un ptyregion depuis de nombreuses années avec une crainte de me faire opérer. J'ai rencontré le docteur Boutin, j'ai tout de suite été en confiance .Un médecin qui fait preuve de gentillesse et d'une grande compétence. Merci infiniment pour vos soins!
El mejor! humano, profesional y carismático! 100% recomendado.
Un chirurgien d’exception et un médecin humain. Il m’a redonné la vue avec des greffes de la cornee. Mille merci Dr Boutin
Il a réglé mon problème qui durait depuis des dizaines années. Merci beaucoup

Un docteur exceptionnel. Ses connaissances font en sorte qu'il peut répondre à chacune de nos questions et ce à ma satisfaction. Même si je ne voyais que des beaux yeux (avec le masque), Je me suis sentie rapidement en confiance avec Dr. Boutin, il a pris le temps de valider avec moi certaines informations qui auraient pu modifier ma décision quant au choix de correction de la vue. Merci Dr Boutin d’être ce que vous êtes.

Love this doctor . I have Fuchs dystrophy and I searched high and low for a proper corneal specialist . He has amazing hands . He is kind and caring . I was going to get a corneal transplant in the USA but when I found Dr Boutin, I knew I would be well taken care of .

Un magicien de la cornée! Il m’a greffé de la cornée et m’a redonné la vue.

Une chance pour moi qu’il offre ses services en clinique à Trois-Rivières. J’ai seulement eu à me déplacer à Montréal pour la chirurgie. Sa clinique et son personnel est impeccable. Au delà de ces connaissances impressionnantes, un médecin d’une profonde bonté. Merci Dr Boutin.

Dr Boutin m’a offert une chance incroyable de revoir avec mon oeil qui était très malade depuis plusieurs années. Très professionnel et connaissant. C’est une réelle chance d’être son patient. Merci pour les bons soins.
Dr Boutin was amazing in analyzing the issue with my eye, explain to the resident doctor in training and explain to me in terms I would understand. Great rapport.

WeOW! Quel homme extraordinaire . Nous avons attendu 16 ans pour faire opérer l'oeil de notre fille. Opération complexe . Il a fait des miracles et d'une humanité incroyable envers des parents inquiets et une jeune ado. Croyez moi, rare. 16 ans d'expérience.

One of the best doctors I've ever had. Respects the patient, adapts to their knowledge. Very kind and meticulous. Takes the time to do his research and makes sure you make an informed decision. Puts the well-being of the patient first.

English version follows

J'ai été opérée par Dr Edelstein pour une cataracte à l'oeil gauche, et j'ai été insatisfaite à tous points de vue. Il s'est comporté comme si ma vision n'était pas de mes affaires. 

Il m'a suivie à intervalles réguliers avant de procéder avec l'opération. À chaque rendez-vous, j'essayais de poser mes questions de la façon la plus claire et la plus concise possible. Lorsque je demandais à quel résultat je devais m'attendre, sa seule réponse était : « Attendez-vous à porter des lunettes ». Lorsque j'insistais pour avoir des détails, il s'impatientait et haussait le ton.

J'ai décidé de lui faire confiance, et je l'ai regretté. Je n'entrerai pas dans les détails médicaux car mon cas n'est pas typique, mais moi qui avais été myope toute ma vie mais avec une excellente vision de proche, je me suis retrouvée très presbyte du jour au lendemain, sans en avoir été prévenue, sans avoir été informée de mes options et sans jamais d'explications. J'étais dans la mi-cinquantaine au moment de l'opération et je devrai vivre avec les conséquences pour le reste de mes jours.

J'ai connu de multiples effets secondaires suite à l'opération, et encore aujourd'hui je « sens » mon implant. Je ne peux cependant pas affirmer que ces problèmes sont dûs à la performance de Dr. Edelstein.

De plus, les employés de Dr Edelstein semblaient constamment stressés, et l'attente était INTERMINABLE, à un point où c'est irrespectueux pour les patients qui sont en majorité âgés. Trop de patients ont rendez-vous tous en même temps le matin, il n'y a pas suffisamment de places dans la salle d'attente et souvent de nombreuses personnes doivent attendre pendant plus d'une heure debout dans le corridor.

Pour conclure : craignant un résultat similaire pour mon autre oeil, j'ai consulté un autre ophtalmologiste (que j'ai trouvé sans référence, sans délai et sans difficulté, et aussi couvert par la RAMQ). Ça a été la meilleure décision de ma vie, car cette fois mon expérience a été entièrement positive et heureusement j'ai pu obtenir une vision très satisfaisante - de près et de loin, et sans lunettes - avec mon oeil droit.

En résumé, mon conseil à vous qui lisez ceci : si un ophtalmologiste ne répond pas à vos questions, ne vous informe pas de vos options, vous traite comme si votre vision n'était pas de vos affaires, SAUVEZ-VOUS EN COURANT ! Ne vous faites pas opérer avant d'être sûr d'avoir obtenu toutes les informations auxquelles vous avez droit.

English version:

I was operated by Dr. Edelstein for a cataract on my left eye, and I have been dissatisfied on all accounts. He treated me as if my vision was none of my business.

He followed me at regular intervals before proceeding to the operation. On each appointment, I tried to phrase my questions in the most clear and concise way possible. When I asked what result I should expect, his only answer was "Expect to wear glasses". If I insisted for more details, he grew impatient and raised his voice.

I decided to trust him, and I have regretted it. I will not go into medical details as my case is not typical, only that having been short-sighted all my life, but with an excellent near vision, I found myself very far-sighted overnight, without warning, without being informed of my options and without ever an explanation. I was in my mid 50s at the time and will have to live with the consequences for the rest of my life. 

I had many side effects after the operation, and to this day I can still "feel" my implant. However I cannot go as far as to say that these problems are a result of Dr. Edelstein's performance.

Furthermore, Dr. Edelstein's employees appeared constanly stressed, and the waiting time was ENDLESS, to a point where it is disrespectful to the patients, a majority of whom are aged. Too many patients are called in at the same time in the morning, and as there are not enough seats in the waiting room, often many people have to wait standing up in the corridor for an hour or more.

In conclusion: fearing for a similar result for my other eye, I consulted another ophtalmologist (whom I found with no references, delay or difficulty, and also covered by the RAMQ). It has been my best decision ever, this time my experience was totally positive and luckily I obtained an very satisfactory vision - near and far, and without glasses - with my right eye.

To sum up, my advice to those reading this: if an ophtalmologist does not answer your questions, does not inform you of your options, treats you as if your vision is none of your business, RUN FOR YOUR LIFE! Do not go ahead with the operation before you are assured you have received all the nformation you're entitled to.
Dr. Edelstein came highly recommended and didn't disappoint. I had both cataract surgeries within 2 weeks of each other and results have been outstanding. Very happy and highly recommend.

I rate this doctor as one of the best ophthalmologists in Montreal. He is very honest. He has a great knowledge in his field. If he knows the answer he'll tell you and if not he will just refer you to the doctor who can help you.

Tout d'abord, la plus belle qualité de ce chirurgien est qu'il est très humain; il ne se prend pas pour Dieu. Il est très à l'écoute de ses patients et il est très explicite en ce qui concerne les soins qu'il prodigue. Il a la santé de ses patients à coeur; j'en suis la preuve vivante car j'ai reçu une greffe de cornée et je suis SON cas complexe de cornée... Il a fait de la recherche, il a lu nombre d'articles et lorsque j'avais un rendez-vous eh bien! il m'expliquait clairement le résultat de ce qu'il avait trouvé et il m'expliquait ce qui me convenait le mieux. À chaque chirurgie, je savais parfaitement ce qui m'attendait alors j'étais rassurée et j'avais totalement confiance. En terminant, je dirais que dans notre système de santé qui est malade, il est rassurant de savoir que de tels médeçins existent... Mon medeçin sait que je suis reconnaissante car je lui ai dit mais n'y a-t-il pas un adage qui dit que les paroles s'envolent et les écrits restent... alors je l'ai écrit!

Dr Perrier est un chirurgien exceptionnel. Il nous a littéralement redonné la vue!! Il a opéré plusieurs membres de ma famille et les résultats sont divins! Plein de bienveillance, empathie et humanisme. Toujours souriant et plein d’énergie. Chaudement recommandé. Définitivement le meilleur dans le West Island. Dispute his heavy workload, he takes his time to answer your questions in a very professional,personable and amicable way; will even crack a joke ! I would highly recommend him to anyone needing eye care of any type

Un chirurgien exceptionnel. Un être de compassion et d’empathie. Recommandé à 100%.

Je suis une artiste-peintre. Mes yeux sont ma vie. Dr Perrier est aussi un artiste et il m’a redonné la vie!! Un chirurgien hors du commun qui a su comment calmer mes craintes et angoisses . Un expert dans son domaine doué d’un grand humanisme. J’en serai reconnaissante toute ma vie!

J’ai la DMLA, glaucome et cataracte. J’ai la chance d’être suivi régulièrement par Dr Perrier depuis une dizaine d’années. Je serai toujours reconnaissante envers ce chirurgien exceptionnel. Il a opéré mes deux parents de 89 ans qui voient maintenant mieux que moi lol. Il est charismatique, souriant, accueillant et semble vraiment prendre à coeur le bien-être de ses patients. Une vraie perle.

Simply the best eye surgeon in the West Island. Results exceeding expectations. Forever grateful for his amazing care. He has operated on my wife, two of my brothers and myself. Strongly recommended. Extremely knowledgeable, kind and caring with expert surgical hands. He really knows what he is doing. He aims for perfection and it shows.

Dr Perrier est un chirurgien exceptionnel. Empathique, souriant, accueillant. Un vrai expert dans son domaine. Il a opéré quelques amis et membres de ma famille avec des résultats parfaits. Recommandé à 100%.

Perfectionist, professional, courteous, always smiling with a sincere desire to give his best to each of his patients. This doctor has very poor social/people skills, he is impatient and impolite. He mumbles under his mask and is annoyed that you don't do as he wants. I am so grateful to Dr. Perrier, so thankful for his skill, his sincere interest in his patients and their wellbeing, and for his easy and approachable manner. This doctor is arrogant and does not want to waste a second of his time in explanations necessary for the patient who wants to know more about his illness. He shows no empathy. Luckily I was able to find another more friendly and professional ophthalmologist.

Fabulous ophthalmologist. Operated on me for cataracts with stellar success and I can't remember when I last saw this well. Top scores for efficiency, efficacy and helpfulness, and many thanks, Dr Perrier, for your miracle-working, I'll always be grateful for the gift of clear sight you gave me! Henry C.

Très froid, aucune empathie. Il a même dit à ma mère de 88 ans qu'il n'y avait plus grand chose à faire pour elle, à part une très dure chirurgie au-desous de son oeil droit, en lui pesant très fort à l'endroit en question. Je ne le recommande pas si vous devez y aller pour votre parent âgé.

went for my 96+ yr old dad, troubling seeing in left eye, the Dr, recommended a laser cleaning of the lens that was put in 10 yrs ago...very nice chap, bilingual, friendly, I was informed that at my dad's age, there was not much more that could be done..

Excellent médecin, elle est super fiable et vraiment à l’écoute. Mon opération s’est super bien passée j’ai retrouvé ma vue! C’est une magicienne de la chirurgie!

Very compassionate doctor. She is human and very competent! She dedicated a lot of time with my intellectual handicap sister who is suffering from glaucoma. Thank you Dr.Aubin for helping my sister; the world needs more doctors like you.
elle est tres sensible aux gens et elle connait bien les troubles occulaires

Excellent doctor! I was in the hospital Maisonneuve Rosemont and she was very sweet to me. I recommend her.

je suis très contente avec elle, et très satisfaite , très très très competente , bravo et un grand chapeau

Ce serait très professionnel de sa part. De plus, la secrétaire manque d'idées pour les mensonges. Je vais faire une plainte à la direction de l'hôpital.

I had an emergency eye infection and she was able to see me right away! She is extremely caring and very knowledgeable and the staff is beyond friendly too. The office and examination room is super cute and you can tell she puts all her love into her profession. I highly recommend this clinic and Dr. Sandra

I highly recommend Dr. Tcherkezian with flying stars. She is extremely dedicated, caring, and truly takes the time needed for her patients. I met Dr. Sandra for the first time today. She is wonderful and knowledgeable and was a pleasure to deal with. Her staff is equally personable and sweet. Honestly, so happy I discovered them. They know their business!
This office and the Dr. Are fantastic. Very friendly and knowledgeable.. I totally recommend Dr. Tcherkezian and her amazing staff

 " mat-doc-finger prints ". Je lui voue une reconnaissance infinie. J'espère que la dame " Silver " qui est décédé à Gaza n'est pas un membre de sa famille. Je suis de tout coeur avec lui et sa famille!

I have been a patient of Dr Silver for over ten years, he has looked after my eyesight carefully and in August and September 2021 carried out perfect Cateract operations for both eyes. He is meticulous and thorough and I consider him an absolute professional.
Son empathie et sa présence ont été remarquables. Il a su me réconforter et me rassurer. Il est aussi très compétent et sait expliquer les diagnostics.
known him since 1978 always a good experience, saved my husbands sight too

I know that Dr. Silver has a reputation for being rude but i just find him to be very straightforward. He asks after my family, and my job, he's polite and he's efficient. He has even called me personally to check up on me. I have genuinely never had anything but a positive experience with him.

I'll gladly agree with those patients, who like myself, found this doctor extremely rude. He literally 'barked ' at me when during a visit to his DDO office I genuinely asked if measuring eye pressure was a test that I could request. He rudely and angrily responded: what gave you that idea?
He is pleasant polite and explains what needs to be done.

Amazing ophthalmologist that performed my cataract operation and his impeccable expertise over 20+ years that I have been seeing him is testimony to a great talent and skilled doctor. His diagnosis is top notch, precise and no nonsense in giving valued counsel. Surely the #1 of all ophthalmologists in Montreal.

I have been going to Dr. Silver for at least 35 years. I find him very knowledgeable and very caring. He has closed his West Island office but I will still drive to Cote des Neiges to see him, I care that much about him and his skills.

I have been seeing Dr Silver for the past five years to monitor the cataracts in both eyes. He tells me exactly how they progress and is very honest and forthright in his explanations. I highly recommend his services.

An older, experienced ophthalmologist who has kept up with surgical technology, a rare combination. Self assured but not arrogant, he inspires confidence. He is entirely covered by Medicare, not common in his field where the majority of doctors have gone private, charge for drops, etc. He does ask for a special high tech measurement before surgery which is a $200. fee, done at a high tech optical centre. This enables the lenses you receive to be the most accurate they can be in 2019.
Excellent and knowledgeable. Did not make me return for a test done in his office, and live with a possible diagnosis.
Excellent doctor, great follow up and knows his business...great staff too.
Brillant, acts like lightening when he diagnoses a problem, and very understanding!

I saw him this passed summer, along with 2 other optometrists, 2 GPs, and another ophthalmologist for difficulties I was having. PLEASE RETIRE - just the rudest meanest person - until he found out that while I don;t show it that I have money - suddenly he stopped insulting me and started to help but failed miserably anyway - he is from the days when male doctors were allowed to act like gods but hey buddy you are in the wrong millennium retire before you cost someone their sight

My first visit met with a no nonsense but kind doctor who knew his field inside out confidently. A rare opthomologist who sees patients covered by Medicare. Very busy staff had difficulty coping, but was ultimately efficient in handling numerous details.

I have been wearing glasses for more than 50 years and upon his suggestion, I chose to go with the 'mono vision' and now I don't need any glasses not even for reading. My cataract surgery has been a real success. Hat's off to you, Dr. Silver and thank you.
Have been with him many years. Trust is not an issue and nor is professionalism.
I am a patient with Dr. Silver. He is not Silver he is Gold. How gentle and knowledgeable. I wish more patients comments

This doctor motto is " please pay on your way out" he and his staff have no compassion. he may be a doctor with experience but there are many of those in Montreal that treat their patients with respect. I left feeling awful.

He explain me my conditions and patiently answered all my questions. His receptionist was nice and helpful, even she was very busy. I would highly recommend Dr. Silver.

Dr. Silver is a consummate professional. My 93 year old father had cataract surgery performed by Dr. Silver and it went extremely well. Dr. Silver was patient and treated my father with respect. I was also very pleased with the efficiency of his office. The appointments were all completed quickly and were on time.
Although knowledgeable - staff is rude - he is rude and arrogant - full of himself - found another Doctor .

I believe that Dr. David Silver is one of the finest medical professionals I have ever seen. I am 58, so I have seen a few. Some say he is abrupt or severe. But I recommend that those people grow up a bit. If your eyes are important to you, you want a real pro who KNOWS what he is doing, not some mamby pamby PR hack who is more concerned with his image than the matter at hand., Today, Dr. Silver performed cataract surgery on me and it was painless, flawless and likely as perfect a medical procedure as one can experience. I have enjoyed every visit with Dr. Silver since I first saw him and I have to say I think he is witty and personable as well. Thanks, Dr. Silver!
Punctuality is always a difficult subject, a veritable mystery for Quebec based medical professionals, however as a Doctor, knowledge, ability and the staff's knowledge he is outstanding.

Dr.Silver has been my eye doctor for over 35 years. He is highly competent, very professional. personable, respectful of opinion . He has always been courteous . Dr. David Silver is concerned with his patients' welfare. i am happy to have him as my eye doctor.

He has been my doctor for years. A total profesional and usually on time. He must answer the same question 10 times a day so can come off as a bit imperious but who cares. In surgery he is calm and reassuring. On an related note his secretary Anna is fantastic and never misses a beat.
This doctor is running his clinic like a chinese sweat shop in and out in 2 minutes and pay on the way out.No satisfacion at all

My Father has been a patient with Dr. Silver for almost 40 years, he had lens implants done at the Jewish general done. Now he has 20/20 vision. 40 years later. This is pretty impressive. 40 years ago they didn't have LASIK!!!!! To this day he still see's Dr. Silver, my father is 84 years old. Dr. Silver is very respectful and a caring man. I go with my father to these appointment, Dr. Silver always invites me in to rooms, unlike most Doctors. I am also a patient of his and I have no issues with Dr. Silver. He treats me with respect and cares to my concerns. I have friends or family members that need good eye surgeon, I would recommend Dr. Silver and his Staff in a heart beat!!! Faithful patient!

Dr Silver is a professional. I have been a patient of his for 25 years and he is consistant in his manner and methods. He asks questions, and LISTENS to the response. I have never waited longer than 10 minutes for an appointment. Anna, his long time receptionist, is always polite and friendly. Very nice atmosphere in the office.
In his West Island Office he can be a bit impatient. When doing surgery at Jewish General early in the day, he is relaxed and very efficient. The man to see for a problem, he's best with a challenge.

I got laser surgery from Dr Silver about 8 months ago and he was really great. He was professional, answered all my questions, and dealt very well with my nervousness on the day of surgery. I am VERY surprised to see ppl had issues with him being impatient or rude because I have never seen this at all! He spoke to me very straight-forwardly, which I took as honest, and explained the surgery in detail without dumbing it down, which perhaps ppl interpreted as cold but I appreciated a great deal. I would recommend Dr Silver to anyone, and my laser surgery left me with better than 20/20 vision. It was more expensive than places like LASIK MD, but I was happy to pay for peace of mind that I was getting personalized attention. The only negative comment I have is a very bad experience with a temp-receptionist at his Cote Des Neiges office who was EXTREMELY rude, bordering on threatening. She is not the regular receptionist though, and I never saw her after that experience (thankfully!).
He is an excellent doctor! I travel from Ontario just to have him follow my eye condition!

I saw Dr. Silver about 12 years ago and I never went back.It was the weirdest experience ever! He was very anal retentive,rude and unhelpful. He told me I had to place my purse on the floor on the left side of the chair. He put drops into my eyes and told me to go back into the waiting room for 20 minutes. When I was called back into the examining room, I forgot and I put my purse on the right side of the chair and he got angry and said "I already told you where to put your purse!" He also wanted me to place my purse in the exact same spot too. He should have put an X on the floor to mark the spot! He put a magnifying lens in one eye after several attempts. However, he was so impatient that he refused to check my other eye. I asked if he could try just one more time and he said no. His ego was so inflated that when I mentioned that I have a regular Ophthalmologist, he snapped at me,getting very agitated. He appeared to be jealous that he wasn't the chosen one. Very unprofessional!

Ten years ago or so, I had laser surgery for myopia on the right eye with another doctor, and was overcorrected. I went to Dr. Silver for the other eye. Although he knew there had been a problem with the first, he ended up overcorrecting me also, because he was too busy bragging to listen to me. I saw it happening when the drops I was supposed to take to stop regression were producing overcorrection, but when I called to tell him he brushed me off: "Trust me". Luckily I didn't trust him and stopped anyway. Next time I saw him he said:stop right now. I said I already had - he looked stunned! Nevertheless, I had to get progressive glasses for hyperopia immediately after. I am now +2.0.

I had laser surgery done 10 years ago. He was knowledgeable and helpful. However, in the rest of his practice - eye exams - he is impatient, and doesn't take the time to explain problems. He once made a mistake with my prescription, and I had to have the lenses on my glasses changed due to his error. He now refers patients to an optometrist for eyeglass prescriptions (a good thing because he rushes his patients, and doesn't take the time necessary for this important procedure.) A relative of mine told me she was very dissatisfied with him, because he didn't wash his hands and she developed pinkeye after her visit. I have switched to another ophthalmologist, and realize how many shortcuts he has taken when examining my eyes. I would not recommend him.
This doctor does not show much respect. I went there to find out about removing cataracts and he was so rude. I would definitely not recommend him to anyone.

Doctor performed PRK surgery, he is great. He is extra conservative, but we are talking about our eyes people! he isnt like those commercial places that only see $$$$$$ signs when you walk in their doors.

Dr. Silver has been my opthalmologist for many years. He knows his work, is professional, on time and kind. Granted he is, at times, impatient, but then again, what human isn't? I trust him and that counts in my books. I wouldn't go to anyone else.

Absolutely the worst doctor I have ever had the misfortune of seeing. This 'doctor' performed PRK on my right eye in 1997, it was an absolute disaster. Using a Technolas laser he disabled the auto tracking which resulted in a non-centered ablation. He is lucky to be practicing 'medicine' in Canada where there is no legal recourse, at least none of substance. I had headaches constantly for 9 years, until I had LASEK performed on my other eye by reputable doctors in the US. I am disgusted that he is still practicing medicine.
My whole family just love to go to eye doctor every year. Dr Silver is wonderful with the boys, would take the extra few minutes to chat with them.
Doctor Silver operated on both my eyes for cataracts. He was very professional and did everything to calm any fears I may have had before the first operation. He is now my opthamologist for life.
Dr. Silver has taken care of my eyes for at least 22 years. He has performed cataract surgery on my mother's eyes and was most professional and human. He is very respectful of seniors.
Dr Silver demonstrated excellent knoledge and professionnalism during my visits. He is very ponctual and quickly corrected my problems.

I have been a patient of Dr Silver (David), in excess of 20 years. The wait time today was 10 minutes, somewhat unheard of when visiting a doctor. He is very professional and took time to explain a certain procedure (in layman terms). There is something very comfortimg when one walks into a medical office and the receptionist (who has been there over 20 years) and the doctor both smile when they greet you.
Very professional and patient. Treated me with respect and calmed my fears. I would recommend him to anyone.
Excellent doctor. Very knowledgeable. Can be sometimes impatient. But he knows his work.
Doctor Silver is very professionaland an excellenlt opthamologist.
Un Dr passionné par sa profession et attentionné envers ses patients. Un ophtalmologiste qui sait mettre ses patients en confiance et bien leur expliquer les choses.

Dr Thompson operated on my eye. I am a nervous rack and I have a phobia for needles. Dr. Thompson was EXTREMELY patient and very human. He walked me through the whole procedure and reassured me every minute of it.
He gave me an appointment for a follow-up right away. We dont find this humanity and kindness every where.
Not only a great doctor but great and understanding human being.
Voilà un spécialiste qui non seulement est compétent et expérimenté, mais qui surtout se distingue par sa grande humanité. Ce genre de professionnel ne se rencontre pas à chaque coin de rue.
Spécialiste très compétent pour opérations de cataracte, mais le personnel de bureau est inefficace.
best doc saved my eye best one ever that i seen i trust him with my eyes closed any time
Opéré du ptérygion par le Dr Thompson en 2016, ma vision est meilleur. J'apprécie surtout son professionnalisme, son reconfort, sà considération du client. Merci Docteur.

Après l'extraction de la cataracte de mon oeil le plus affecté par la dégénérescence maculaire due à l'âge, j'ai pu constater dès le lendemain de la chirurgie, une très bonne amélioration de ma vue. Et j'anticipe le bonheur et l'honneur de me faire extraire la cataracte de mon autre oeil. Car jusqu'à présent, tout sest très bien déroulé et ce, depuis son bureau de consultation à la clinique ophtalmologique de l'Ouest jusque dans la salle de chirurgie d'un jour. J'ai été bien accueillie. Lors de la chirurgie je n'ai ressenti aucune douleur. Après la chirurgie non plus. Actuellement, j'en suis au deuxième jour après et je me sens bien. 
Le docteur Paul Thompson est vraiment compétent et le personnel de sa clinique est compétent.
J'ai eu la chance et l'honneur d'être sa 15,001ème opérée des cataractes.
tres accueillant et tres professionnel .. ca fait 15 ans que je suis suivie par Dr Thompson pour greffe de cornee et tres pro ophtalmo. Merci

Le Docteur Thompson est Impeccable! Jai ete suivie depuis pres de 2 ans deja et je nai que de bonnes choses a dire. Jai eu une greffe de la cornée suite a un Keratocone et cest absolument un des meilleurs! Jai ete aux prises pendant 20 ans avec ce probleme et immediatement lorsquil a pris mon cas en charge, on a operer, et maintenant, je vois comme quand jetais jeune. Je ne peux demander mieux dun doc. Il est patient, explique tellement bien, a un sens de lhumour et surtout comprehensif. Que de bonnes choses a dire <3

Très bon ophtalmologue, il a fait un suivi pendant 2 mois sur mon œil suite à une infection et un ulcère cornéen alors que les urgences de l’hôpital avaient refusé de me soigner. Beaucoup de patience et il prend le temps d'expliquer, traiter et soulager la douleur.

Le docteur Thomson ma opere pour une cataracte. Apres loperation j ai pas vu d amelioration. Le docteur Thompson m a dit qu il faulait quant meme operer l autre oeil.j ai vu un autre ophthalmologiste qui m a envoye a un specialiste de la ratine. Ces deux docteurs m ont dit que mon probleme etait pas la cataracte mais c etait un probleme de ratine. Ils m ont dit que ca servait a rien d operer l autre oeil et qu le docteur Thompson m avait opere pour rien. Un de ces docteur m a meme dit que c etait pas la premiere fois qui voyait des patients du docteur Thompson qui etait operer alors que c etait pas necessaire. Ou bien donc le docteur Thompson est un inconpetent ou bien il m a operer pour faire de l argent sur mon dos.
Un des meilleurs spécialiste au monde, très professionnel, prends soin d'expliqué à ses patients, espérons le garder longtemps.
tres connaissant, il a detecte un probleme que deux autres specisliste n'avait pas vu, Longue vie a ce medecin.

J'ai été oppéré pour une catharacte en janvier 08, J'avais peur et il était tellement professionnel que tout de suite ça m'a rassuré, ce fut un succès et sans aucune douleur, Merci Dr.Thomson je vois maintenant en HD

J'ai eu une greffe de la cornée pour mon oeil droit en Décembre passé, un beau cadeau de Noël. J'étais très nerveuse et Dr. Thompson m'a rassuré tout de suite et il a bien expliqué ce qu'il faisait tout le long de l'opération. Il est calme et très professionnel en plus d'avoir un bon sens de l'humour. Il prend le temps de répondre aux questions. Il fait un travail remarquable et je le recommande fortement. Merci.

Cet sommité dans le domaine de l'ophtalmologie, est un être exceptionnel, il a put faire une greffe à ma femme qui as durée pendant 20 ans. Bien sûr , aujourd'hui, elle a perdu cette greffe, mais on lui doit quand ces 20 années gagnés, Merci Dr. thomson....Suzanne Savoie et Jean !
Very good doctor and always nice and helpful. He answers questions and gives good explanations. It is always a pleasure to be treated by him.

He is a great and knowlegable Dr. He had a private clinic downtown and he also work at Notre Dame hospital. I'm really lucky to find him. He is a marvelous surgery with fairy hands. He do a miracle for my right eye. the left is jalous and he is waiting for his surgery. Thanks DR Thompson!

He is a great and knowlegable Dr., if it wastn't for his expertise I would have lost my eye. Yes he is very busy, he has a clinic and he also does office at Notre Dame + he does surgery. He is worth the wait, and I feel very confident with him.
Enfin un médecin qui prend le temps de nous écouter, qui étudie bien notre dossier qui est un humain comme nous et non pas ces médecins arrogants qui nous expédie à toute vitesse ! Merci Dr. Meere !

I am filled with outmost gratitude to Dr. Meer for him accepting to take my elderly mother of 95 years old at the time under his wings. He did every thing possible to treat her complicated eyes conditions. He is now my eye doctor and I have total confidence in him. But I am very sorry that he doesn't do cataracts operation anymore but I do trust him to refer me to a competent in this matter when the times comes.

Le staff est très ordinaire (exemple : on te met des gouttes dans les yeux sans même prévenir!) mais Dr Meere est hyper competent, posé, compréhensif, patient. Il y a souvent des délais car il prend beaucoup de temps avec ses patients.
Très professionnel, d'une humanité rare, sage, posé, zen. il est rassurant et très efficace. Très respectueux de ses patients.

Docteur Meer est un super docteur. Il tres sage et prend a coeur le soin de ces patiens . Il prodigue beaucoup de conseil et est pret a soulager ces patiens tant sur medical que des conseils. Je auis l'un de ces patiens et je l'apprecie enorment pour son travail . Merci a lui etbonne continuite a lui.

Une personne sage avec beaucoup de qualités, à l'écoute de ses patients , il tient les cas à coeur pour donner des conseils pertinents . Pour le cas à mon fils qui est un cas râre dans un accident de soccer , il a été là pour nous, d'ailleurs c'est le seul soutien qu'on a pu avoir ,il a même refusé ses honoraires pour la dernière consultation ,pour le reste de l'équipe on était bien accueilli et on a pas eu de problèmes à avoir les rendez-vous .👍

Je suis énormément reconnaissante que Dr Meere soit tombé sur mon dossier. Le personnel de la Clinique de Santé Visuel était très froid, les temps d'attente longs et les erreurs de dossier un peu trop nombreuses. Par contre, lorsque j'ai rencontré Dr Meere, je me suis soudain sentie rassurée. Il était très calme, chaleureux et a été très proactif au sujet de ma situation particulière.
Très professionnel et rassurant. Il a été à l'écoute, respectueux et a assuré un suivi de qualité pour ma situation.

Il est adorable. Il est patient, gentil, aimable. D'une délicatesse rare de nos jours dans le domaine de la médecine. On sent sa compétence et il prend bien soin de nous. Nous sommes entre de bonnes mains.
Dr. Meere is an amazing ophthalmologist. His calm demeanor and knowledge put you at ease and reassures you that you are in capable hands. Very thorough and conscientious work ethic.
Très professionnel et il prend le temps d'expliquer clairement le problème. Très humain. Assistante très gentille également.
Très humain, prends soin du patient et donne d'exellents conseils. Je lui souhaite une merveilleuse année 2017
Wonderful doctor. I feel so grateful to be his patient. Thank you so much, Dr. Meere.
IL prend le temps, il est a l'écoute, gentil, on se sent entre bonnes mains. Donne de bons conseils. S'ils pouvaient etre tous comme lui.
Excellent médecin. Il suit ma cocotte depuis l'âge de 5 ans et il est vraiment génial autant avec les enfants que dans son champ de compétence. Il est calme et prend son temps. Bravo!

I am impressed with him. I go see him because my retina has detached 5 times already . I have a situation that affects my health and sleeping patterns . Every time I seen Dr. Meere he has a way of calming me and reassuring me at the same time and after my visit with him I can get a good night's sleep . I find him and his team to be GOD sent .

Dr Meere est une perle rare mais ces secrétaires c'est vraiment un manque de classe. Dr Meere est le meilleur que j'ai rencontré dans ma vie; patient et humble dans tous les sens du mot.C'est un spécialiste avec lequel je n'ai jamais eu peur de copnfier mes yeux. Bravo d'être là pour nous tous.

Dr Meere est très consciencieux, à l'écoute, il est posé, gentil, il va au delà de nos attentes en s'intéressant à nos antécédents. Je le recommanderai sans hésitation à quiconque aura besoin des soins d'un excellent ophtalmologiste.
Dr Meere est un ophtalmologiste minutieux, intègre, doux et humain qui prend le temps d'écouter son patient et de donner des explications simples et claires. A citer en exemple !
Très bon médecin qui donne de bonnes explications. A la fois professionel et doux à parler.
Very profesional and very informative to his clients. His treatments work.
Un médecin très à l'écoute et qui donne beaucoup d'explications claires. On n'a pas l'impression qu'il est pressé par le temps.
Excellant communication skills both in English and French . Very knowledgeable . Left no stone unturned .thank you Antonio Elisii

I was referred to Dr. Choremis by my optometrist. After about 18 months of monitoring the progression of my vision it was determined that I needed surgery to stop the progression of my disease. Now, about 8 months post operation my vision has significantly improved to the point that my "bad eye" now sees better than my less affected eye. She's extremely knowledgeable and kind. I was very stressed out at the beginning of my surgery but she talked me through it and everything went very well. 5 stars all around.
Elle a opéré mes cataractes l'année dernière. Elle était gentille, attentionnée et j'ai eu un résultat parfait. Merci au Dr Choremis !
She saved my cornea when nobody else could. I'm simply truly grateful ....

Dr. Choremis is an amazing doctor. I am seeing comments that she is too fast. She is fast, bc she sees many patients in a day. She is a serious expert in her field, she is an amazing surgeon, and she restored my vision. I will always be grateful. Thank you

Dr. Choremis saved my eyesight! I was referred by an ophthalmologist because my corneas were chronically ulcerated and I had a real risk of becoming blind. Thank you so much for your incredible knowledge, your skills and your kindness in helping me during a very difficult time.
Have seen dr Choremis twice. Was arrogant rude and didn't bother taking time to explain or answer questions.

Dre Choremis est la spécialiste que j’ai choisie pour ma greffe de cornée et chirurgie de cataracte et je suis très heureuse et satisfaite. J’ai été opéré le 5 décembre 2022 et a 6 semaines postop ma vision était a 20/30. Dans qq mois ce sera l’œil gauche. Atteinte de dystrophie de fuchs je peux confirmer que ca faisait longtemps que je n’avais pas vu aussi clair. Une experte et je l’adore. Merci a vous dre Choremis et a votre équipe!

Dr. Choremis is by far the best cornea specialist I have ever met. I had a RCE ( Recurrent corneal erosion) for 2 years. I visited many doctors. I had an operation on both eyes for cataract. She did an excellent job. My vision is perfect now. She is professional and dedicated. I highly recommended her for eye operation.

She's an incredibly caring, and talented surgeon that saved my eyes when others could not. I had two previous cornea surgeries by other surgeons that did not help and Dr. Choremis was my last hope. Her magical hands gave me my vision back. Thank you Dr. Choremis!

Le Dre Choremis a sauvé mon oeil! Ils m avaient operé 3 fois avant finalement mon ophtalmo m a envoyé chez el’e et 3 jours après la chirurgie je commencais à voir comme avant! En plus elle est Toujours à temps le matin ! Merci Dre Choremis!

Merci au Dr Choremis et son équipe pour avoir oser une opération des cataractes dans les deux yeux compliquée d'une allergie qui a nécessité une attention supplémentaire à tous les détails. Les deux opérations sont réussies et je vois très bien maintenant.
Des doigts de fée! Elle m a fait une greffe de cornée dans les deux yeux. Je vois 10/10 merci Dre Choremis

outstanding, very professional, took the time to explain my condition and treatment,

She was extremely professional and caring. She operated on my rare cornea condition with incredible skill. I’m two months since my surgery and I am able to see better than ever. I would recommend her over all others in the city.
Thank you so much Dr. Choremis ... I was virtually blind when I had my cataract. Dr. Choremis gave my sight back. She's so professional and nice. Her skills are incredible!

Elle a sauvé ma cornée. Elle effectue des chirurgies qu'aucun autre ophtalmologiste fait dans la province. Merci Dr Choremis! Votre expertise, attention aux détails et votre gentillesse m'ont sauvé ma vue. .Nous avons la chance d'avoir un tel expert ici au Québec.

Horrible médecin. Arrogante et aucunement professionnelle. Ne prends pas le temps d'expliquer votre condition ou simplement vous fournir des informations quant à votre diagnostic. Elle tente de se débarrasser de vous dès lors où vous mettez le pied dans son cabinet.

Dr Choremis is the best surgeon! she truly cares and is always on top of things , she s the only surgeon who got my transplant right from the first try ! thank you so much !!

i tell you from experience , this woman is an amazing Doctor and an amazing Surgeon . simply the best in her field
